Bafia: Wɔ̀ Tyoofil, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìkàn ɗi ɓiban ɓi ɓi kilɛ̀ngà ɓi nyìinyìm wìs,
ɓɛ ki kangà ɓyɔ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, à tumɛ̀n à rìtumɛ̀n, ɓɛ kpaaghà; ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛǹ, ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ̀ghagsì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll.

Mɛ̀ mɛ̀ɛ ǹtimi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n ɗi ɓyɔ, nni mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ kìrɔɔ lɛ nkonag ɓyɔ kì wòŋzaagh, ǹki kàn yi wɔ̀ ɓyɔ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n, wɔ̀ gìn i mum ìnɛ lɛ Tyoofil,
lɛ di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ u yi saaɗ ànɛ ɓi mɛ̀rèsàg mɛ ù tekà.

Ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki Eroodɛ à ɓaghà rìfòm ɗi a Zyude, pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àdɛŋ à ɓaghà ŋwaànɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ wu Aɓya, ɗii lɛ Zakarii; gil a ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Eliisaɓɛt; à ki ɓa ɓi boo ì ɓum ì Arɔn.
Kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kiǹ ki ɓaghà lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, lɛ ɓɛ ɓeŋɓèŋgà ɓìɗɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Kan, rì mɛ̀siŋdɛn mii mɛcèm, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ cɔɓtɛn.
Kìɓan kifog ɓɛ ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ man, lɛ Eliisaɓɛt à ɓaghà nɔ̀nɔg, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ Zakarii à ɓaghà ɓiì kìkii kisay kii ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, lɛ caàmàn ki lɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wii ɓɛɛ ki kìsay kɛɛ ɓaghà,
fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pikà ǹtɔ̀ŋ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ki ɓi kìsay ki ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ki ɓaghà, ki ghɛnɛ̀n lɛ nnyɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɗiŋii ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll lɛ a ɓɔgsi nyi rì fìru.
Gwìy ì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n bimiɗ ì ɓaghà ɓiì kìkii bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓi dan, ɓi caàmàn ki ɓɛ m̀ɓɔsaagh Bɛ̀ll miì rì fìru fi tɔ̀nɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom à Kan à rèsɛ̀ngà Zakarii, à rɛlì ɓi weèlem à jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ǹtɔ̀ngì fìru miì.
Yɛ̀ɛ Zakarii à ghɛngà nyi, à ɓuùsɛ̀n, iris wu ɓan nyi.
Kìɓan kifog ŋwaà-fìtom a kpaa nyi lɛ: Zakarii, kɔ̀ɔ risi, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹwoogh bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀, Eliisaɓɛt à giɓ wɔɔ̀ à ɓiì yalì wɔ̀ man à baŋì, ù ròò nyi ɗii lɛ Zyaŋ.
Man ànɛ̀n à rì ɓiì ɓaa com ki, kɛɛ puɓsi wɔ̀ ǹɗem, ki ki fa wɔ̀ coo kìnyàà, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓiì woògh girig kìrɔɔ ɓi rìyalɛ̀n ɗii.
Ɓisuulɛ à ɓiì ɓaà coo mum ɓi mis mɛ Kan, àa nɔ ɓi mɛrɔ̀g, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kì nɔ nsoò com kidɛŋ ki ki ri lɛ ki ŋwaŋzì mum. À ɓiì ɓaà ǹɗonɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, à tumɛ̀n ɓi ɗùm ɗi jɛɛ.
A ɓiì kìi lɛ, ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛɛ sugtiì yɛ̀ɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll wàà.

À ɓiì loògh kisyòŋi Bɛ̀ll bee à ɓa lɛ rì nghay, rì ìtèɗ wu Eli, lɛ a ki lɛ, ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓɛɛ woòghrɛn tì rì ɓɔn ɓaa, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì ǹtogwey ɓɛ ɓa tì rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ɓum ɓɛsaaɗ, à ki pègsɛn Kan kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ki ri kìɓùŋɛn lɛ kɛɛ ghaɓ nyi.
Nni Zakarii à kpaaghà ŋwaà-fìtom lɛ: Lannɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ɓiì yiì lɛ kìɓan kiǹ ki ri saaɗ? Ghɛna lɛ, mɛ̀ ǹti kìtùg ki mum, giɓ wɛm̀ girig kìtùg.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a ɓakà nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ri Gabiriyɛl, ǹti ndɛlàg Bɛ̀ll asu; fɔɔnnɛ àa romiì mɛ̀ lɛ, ǹtoòghrɛn ɓɛɛ wɔ̀, ǹki kpaa wɔ syeesyee à ɓɔlɛ ànɛ.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ù ghèrɛɛ ɓì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m ìnɛ, ì rì ɓìì ronì ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki yɔ̀, kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ù ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi mùm-mùm, kɛ̀ɛ̀ bee inɛ u toòghrɛn à kpaŋ ŋwos anɛ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ɓiì kìlɛɛ.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓoŋɓoŋgà Zakarii ɓi ɗyɔ̀m, ki yeesì ɓɔ ɓisuucɛ nnɛ à finɛ̀ngày fɔlɔɔ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagày, bee inɛ lɛ a kpaa ɓɔ com yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yighà min lɛ, àa ghɛɛ kìɓan kidɛŋ ki koŋnyòò ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll. À fèfèkà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ri ɓyàɓ ǹfèfèghɛn à rɔ̀ɓ lɔŋ mùm-mùm.
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ru mii mɛ kìsay mɛ lekà, à sug a mɛɛ mii.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɔ mɛru ɓɛ ghaghìghà nnɛ Eliisaɓɛt à gil a tekà ɗyem, à kɔ̀rì naa rì naa ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛtaǹ;
à kpaakpaaghà lɛ: Geesɛ̀n yɛɛ̀nɛ Kan à kìi mɛ̀ lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ àa nghɛɛ mɛ̀ nyìighnyìg, à pisì kìɓan ki ki ǹɗì mɛ̀ rì ǹtoòrìɗ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum.
Ɓi ŋwii à kìtaàfog, Bɛ̀ll à romgà ŋwaà-fìtom Gabiriyɛl ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ìnɛ a Galile ɗii lɛ Naazarɛt,
yɛ̀ɛ gɔ̀n ì giɓ ìnɛ ì ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìyiì ɓɛ̀baŋì, ì ki ɓa ri ǹkàg wu riwɛy rì mum ɗii lɛ Yoosɛɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi boo ì mum ì Davit. Gɔ̀n ìncèm ì ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Marii.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom à ɗiŋighà à lɔ̀ŋkii à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ǹtògsii wɔ̀, Bɛ̀ll àa ǹkìi wɔ̀ geesɛ̀n; Kan à rì ǹɗaŋ ri wɔ̀.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ inɛn ì ɓuusìghà Marii tìɓòmis, fɔɔnnɛ à tɔɔghrɛ̀ngà rì ǹɗem lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɗi ɗi resii ɓa cɛ?
Ŋwaàfìtom a kpaa nyi lɛ: Marii, kɔ̀ɔ risi, lɛ Bɛ̀ll à mɛ rèsi wɔ geesɛ̀n.
Ghɛna, ù ɓiì terì ɗyem, ù yay man à baŋì, ù ròò nyi ɗii lɛ Yeesus.
A ɓiì ɓaà kìtèetèɗ ki mum, ɓɛ regì nyi lɛ Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg. Fɔɔnnɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll à rì nyi ɓiì faà ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rìlàmì wu Davit à seŋì à ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀.
À ɓiì làmii naa ì ɓum ì Yakɔɓ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, rìlàmì ɗii ɗi finɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ̀ sugtag.
Nni Marii à tɔkà ŋwaà-fìtom lɛ: Kìɓan kiǹ ki ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ ɓi bee ìbe yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹka yi ɓi ɓɛbaŋì?

Ŋwaàfìtom a pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki rì ɓiì yùu a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ìteɗ wu Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg wu rì wɔ̀ ɓiì ɓyɔɔ. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ ri regi kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Man ki ù ɓiì yalì lɛ: Man à Bɛ̀ll.
Eliisaɓɛt à gaa àmbog àa ǹteri ɗyem di à mɛrùn. Nyi ànɛ ɓɛ roòghà ɗii lɛ nɔ̀nɔg à giɓ, à ti rì ɗyem ɗi ɓɛ̀ŋwii taàfog;
lɛ kìɓan ki ki yag Bɛ̀ll rìkì ki yin.
Nni Marii à kpaaghà lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì ǹkìì-kìsay a Kan, kɛɛ kilɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ wàa kpaà, nni ŋwaà-fìtom a pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà, à ghaàgh.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, Marii à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà à kɛ̀n lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ìnɛ a Zyuda ìnɛ ì ɓaghà ɓi dòn.
À ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa ì Zakarii, à tògsì Eliisaɓɛt.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Eliisaɓɛt à wokà ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓi Marii, man à nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n nyi ɓi ɗùm; Eliisaɓɛt à ɓa ǹɗonɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay.
Nni à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ù rì rì ɓɛmààgh ù cee ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ̀cèm, fɔɔnnɛ man ànɛ ù ɓiì yalì à rì girig m̀maŋɛ̀n.
Rìkuu ɗi kiɓan aɗi ɗyɛɛ ghɛnɛɛ lɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ lɛ, jɛɛ Kan wɛ̀m a yu mɛ̀ jàŋbog?
Ghɛna lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ màa woogh ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓyɔɔ, man àa ghàsi mɛ̀ kìnyɛ̀ŋɗɛɛ ɓi ɗùm rì kìnyàà.
Mààgh rì giɓ anɛ à gherɛ̀ngà, lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi Kan à romgày lɛ ɓɛɛ kali nyi ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ.
Marii à kalì min lɛ: Nɗem wɛ̀m wɛɛ̀ fafa Bɛ̀ll rìkem,
fɔɔnnɛ kìnyàà ki roni mɛ̀ ɓi nɗem lɛ rìkì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ǹghɛɓsì wɛ̀m,
ɓisuulɛ àa m̀ɓɛ̀ŋmɛɛ zɛy rì zɛy à ǹkìì-kìsay wiì à giɓ, fɔɔnnɛ a tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ, gbàà yi ɓum yìcèm yi ri kalaagh gɛ lɛ: Ǹɗì m̀màŋɛn.
Lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm à mɛ kì mɛ ɓɛ̀gɛn ɓɛ ɓiɓan, ɗii ɗii ɗi ri rìtɛnɛn
ǹɗem wii wu nyìighnyìg wɛɛ ghɛnag ɓi gbàà yìcèm, a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ nìgi nyi.
À rèsìghà ìtèɗ wii ɓi ɓɛ̀gɛn ɓɛ ɓìɓan ɓɛ à kìghà; à sangà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ǹɗem wu ncaŋà.
A ɓigtìghà ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓi ɓaghà ɓi rìlàmì, à ɓɔgsi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀sɛɛdɛn ɓi zi ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ ɓɛkemì,
ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wowòkà zày à faghà ɓɔ ìkum lɛɛ̀gwey; ɓɛ̀guŋgum, à nàɓ ɓɔ ɓyàg zɛy.
À ghɛɓsìghà kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Isirayɛl ǹkìì-kìsay wiì kɛ̀ɛ ɗimzɛn lɛ, a resi ǹɗem wu geesɛ̀n,
ɓisuu Abiraham, rì dòò yii, fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kàkà ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis.
Marii à kɔ̀rìghà ɓɛɛ Eliisaɓɛt, nunùg ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓara, fɔɔnnɛ à sukà min.
Yɛ̀ɛ cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ Eliisaɓɛt a yas̀ ki kpagà, nni à yalà man à baŋì.
Ɓumɓɛ à wɔŋzɛ̀ngà mɛɛ ri bɔ, rì ɓɔɔseŋi ɓii ɓɛ wokà lɛ Kan àa ǹɗèsii nyi geesɛ̀n yìì lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n, ɓɛ nyaàrɛ̀n ǹɗaŋ ri nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ man à kpagà mɛ̀ru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ , nni ɓɛ yughà rì nyi lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛ̀ɗ, ɓɛ rerèŋì nyi lɛ Zakarii, ɓi ɗii ɗì seŋi wìì.
Kìɓan kifog, jɛɛ à pɛ̀sì jɛ̀ɛ̀, à kpaa lɛ: Èe èe! À rì ɓìi ɓaa ɗii lɛ Zyaŋ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi boo yɔ̀ɔ̀ à ka ɓaghà ɓi ɗii fɔlɔɔ.
Ɓɛ fefèkà Zakarii à seŋi man rì ɓyàg lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔg nyi ɗii ɗi man.
Nni à lɔngà ɓɔ kìɓoŋ, à kàn miì lɛ: À rì ɗii lɛ Zyaŋ. Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kuuràkà kìɓan kiǹ.
Lɔŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ ìnnɛ ŋwɔm wii wu ŋwarɛ̀ngà, rìlemàg ɗii ɗi fumɓɛ̀n à tumɛ̀n tì rìtòtòg, à ɓɔɔɓɔ̀gsì Bɛ̀ll jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà kòdò bog rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ risìghà ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛcèm; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓi dòn yi a Zyude ɓɛ kuukùrɛ̀ngà lɔŋ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓɛ nyamgà ɓyɔ ɓi ǹɗem, ɓɛ ki tɔɔghtɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀n lɛ: Man ànɛ à ri ɓa ɓaà rìkuu ɗi mum aɗi? Wɔ̀lɛ ìtèɗ wu Kan wu ɓaghà rì man ànɛ̀n a tààkaà.
Nni Zakarii à seŋi à ɓaghà ǹɗonɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, à tumɛ̀n rìtòtòg yɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan à kpaa lɛ:
Rìkem ɗi ghɛ̀ɛsɛɛ rì Kan Bɛ̀ll à Isirayɛl, ɓisuulɛ, àa ǹ-yùu kì ghɛɛ̀ kìlɔ̀ŋ kii, à kwèɗ kɔ
à ki rom yi ɓìsi kìtèetèɗ ki ǹghɛɓsì; ǹghɛɓsì àncèm à ki ɓay ɓi naa ì ɓum ì nkìì-kìsay wiì Davit.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà ɓi ŋwɔm wu ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓii ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ajɛ̀m, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn.
A siŋdɛ̀ngà lɛ, à kòri gɛ ɓìsi ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓɛ̀bènàbena, rì ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ti ɓeɓkì.
Rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛɗi a rèsàg geesɛ̀n yìì ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis, à ki yiti bee inɛ à rengà rì ɓɔ, ìnɛ ìrì ǹtɛnɛn
lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ nyimiɗ à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ, ɓi ǹkàg wu à faghà Abiraham à seŋi wìs à ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀
lɛ à faa gɛ ɓìsi ìtèɗ wulɛ ti ɓɔgsi nyi kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris, di à mɛ kwèɗ ɓisi ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓis,
lɛ tì ɓa ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, tì ki ɓa ti lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mii cɛɓ kis kicèm.
Nni wɔ̀ man ànɛ, ɓum ɓɛ ri regag wɔ lɛ: Ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg, ɓisuulɛ ù ɓiì syòŋi Kan bee, lɛ u log kì pègsɛɛ bee yiì,
ù ki kì lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii ɓɛɛ yi lɛ Bɛ̀ll à kòri ɓɔ, lɛ à mɛ cenɛn ɓɔ ɓìɓe ɓyaa.
Lɛ Bɛ̀ll wìs à rì ǹɗonɛn ri coo geesɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ à ri rom yi ɓìsi kìtɛɛtɛn ki aɗyoo, ki ki ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ baso ì ŋwos
lɛ kɛɛ kpeŋzi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi birìm, rì ɓi kìfìì ki riwù, ki kɛɛ̀sì ɓìsi ɓi bee ì cɛɓ ki fyòoog.
Man ànɛ̀n à tɔɔtɔ̀ɔ̀ghà, ǹghay wii wu tetèɗ ìtèɗ; à ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà ɓi-reɓ à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ à rèsɛ̀ngà ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ŋwos adɛŋ.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, kaaza ànɛ à ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Ogus, à lamìghà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓay ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi zi bimiɗ.
Bàlì ìnɛn yɛ̀ɛ ɓaghà ǹtonto à bàlì, ànɛ à kìlɛ̀ngà ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki Kirinus à ɓaa gɔmìnà ànɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki lɛ Sirii.
Mum ǹcèm à kɛ̀ngà kì ɓàlɛɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yoosɛɓ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà girig a Galile, ɓi bàn ìnɛ lɛ Naazarɛt, lɛ a kɛǹ, a Zyude ɓi bàn ì Davit ìnɛ lɛ Bɛtilɛhɛm, ɓisuulɛ à ɓaghà ɓi boo ì mum ì Davit;
à kɛ̀ngà wɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓay ɓɔ ɓɛɛ̀ Marii à kìlɔnì kii ànɛ à ɓaghà rì ɗyem.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ kaka a Bɛtilɛhɛm, cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ Marii a yas̀ ki kpagà;
nni à yalà man wìì à ǹtonto baŋì, à lɔkì nyi rì ɓìlàà, à nɔ̀ŋzì nyi ɓi kìɓɛrɛ ki ɓìtuwe ɓi ǹɗilàg miì lɛ jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ kɔrì miì ì ɓatìghà ɓi ɓi naà-ɓɛ̀kèn.
Ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kɔm̀ kiǹ, ɓɛ̀bèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓɛ ǹlaayì cɛm a dɛm, ɓɛ ɓeŋɓèŋ ɓìtuwe ɓyaa.
Yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a Kan à resɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, kìtɛɛtɛn ki rigwey ɗi Bɛ̀ll ki ceŋzɛ̀n ɓɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ risìghà lɛɛ̀gwey.
Kìɓan kifog ŋwaà-fìtom à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi risì, ǹɗìì mìni rì syeesyee à ɓɔlɛ̀ ànɛ à rì ɓiì faa kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm coo kinyàà ɓi mɛ̀rem.
Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n à rì lɛ: ǹghɛɓsì ɓum à yalɛɛ gɛɛ̀nɛ ɓìsu wìn, ɓi bàn ì Davit, nnyɛɛ ri Kiris Kan.
Nni kìrèmzɛnà ki ki ri mìni ɓiì rèsii nyi ki ri lɛ, ɓì ɓiì tanɛɛ man à m̀ɓwɛɗ ǹlɔkakɛn, ǹnɔ̀ŋziyɛn ɓi kìɓɛrɛ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sigmɛ̀ngà di kìtuu ki ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ aɗyoo ki mɛ yù ki tanɛɛ roà ǹtonto, ɓɛ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀gsì Bɛ̀ll di ɓɛɛ kpaakpaa lɛ;
Rìkem ɗyɛɛ ki Bɛ̀ll ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, fyòoog à ɓa rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à keesii.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ sugtìghà kì ɓɔɔgh aɗyoo, nni ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓɛ rɔɓkà kì kpaa wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Ti kɛ̀ɛna a Bɛtilɛhɛm, ti ghɛn kìɓan ki kaa kìlɛɛ wɔɔ, kɛɛ̀ki Kan àa wogsii ɓìsi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà wɔɔ ri mɛ̀ree, ɓɛ tanɛ̀n Marii rì Yoosɛɓ, rì maa man ànɛ̀n ǹnɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn ɓi kìɓɛrɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà man ànɛ̀n, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkpaa ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ŋwaà-fìtom à kpaaghà ɓɔ ɓi kìɓan kii.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓɛ kpaaghà ɓiǹ, ɓɛ kuuràkà ɓyɔ.
Marii à ɓèŋɓèŋgà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm, à ki fèfeg ɓyɔ rì ǹɗem.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓɛ sugtìghà di ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ keèkèmzì nyi rì tyem ɓisuulɛ, ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ŋwaà-fìtom a kpaaghà ɓɔ, ɓi ɓaghà com kìfog rì ɓi ɓɛ ghɛngà.
Ɓi mɛ̀ru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ànɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛsɛ̀ngà kì kɛ̀ri man, innɛ ɓɛ roòghà nyi ɗii lɛ Yeesus; ɗii ɗìn ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ŋwaà-fìtom à faghà, di jɛɛ à ka teɗ ɓi ɗyem ɗii.

Yɛ̀ɛ cààmɛ̀n ki zòghɛ̀n inɛ Yoosɛɓ ɓɛɛ̀ Marii ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì kìlɛɛ ki kpagà, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà rì man ànɛ̀n a Yorisalɛm, lɛ ɓɛɛ resi nyi ɓi mis mɛ Kan,
lɛ ki ri kì kànɛn ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Kan lɛ: Man à baŋì bimiɗ ànɛ à rì man à ǹtonǹto, ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ nyi kì faà rì Kan;
ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì fùnɛɛ ɓɛ̀kuùkuù ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ̀sɔ̀m ɓɛ kòokòs ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, lɛ fɔɔnnɛ ki ri kì kànɛn ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Kan.
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà a Yorisalɛm ɗii lɛ Simeyɔŋ, à ɓaghà syeesyee à mum, ànɛ àa nti à risàg Bɛ̀ll; à ɓoŋɓòŋgà gòri ì Isirayɛl, à ɓaghà rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay.
Nni Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki rèsìghà nyi lɛ, àa wu ɓi di à ka ghɛn ɓi Kiris ànɛ Kan à ɓiì romìì.
Fɔɔnnɛ Simeyɔŋ à yughày ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ Nghay à tinìghày nyi; nni ɓɛ̀yalì ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ yuyùghày rì man waà lɛ ɓɛɛ roòzi rìkpaa ɗi ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ Simeyɔŋ à ghàɓkà man ànɛ̀n ɓi ɓyàg ɓii, à fa Bɛ̀ll rìkem à kpaa lɛ:
Tààta, ù ti lɛ ù càɗ ǹkìì-kìsay wɔɔ lɛ, a sug rì ǹɗem ɓi ɗùm ɓigomìnɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ù mɛ roozi ǹkàg wɔɔ.
Ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ ǹɗuusii mis ɓi nghɛɓsì-ɓum ànɛ ù romiì
nyi nnɛ ù pègsɛ̀ngà ɓi mis mɛ ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm.
À rì kìtɛɛtɛn ki kii ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓi ziinɛ ɓyɛ yi wɔ̀, ki ki fa Isirayɛl à kìlɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ rikem.
Seŋi rì jɛɛ Yeesus ɓɛ rɔɓkà myɔm ɓìkpaŋ, ɓɛ keg ɓìɓan ɓi Simeyɔŋ à kpaakpààghà ɓisuu man ànɛ̀n.

Fɔɔnnɛ Simeyɔŋ à màgà ɓɔ, à kpaa Marii à jɛɛ man lɛ: Man ànɛ A ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛɛ kɛɓtɛn fìɓàg ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn; à rì ɓiì ɓaà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ roànɛ a konag kì rèsii yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓeèzɛɛ rìkì ɗi Bɛ̀ll,
Wɔɔmiɗ anɛ, ù ɓiì woògh ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mɛ̀yitì mɛ mɛ rì ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓiì yilɛɛ.

Giɓ adɛŋ ɗii lɛ Ana, gɔ̀n ì Fanuɛl, ŋwaànɛ ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Azɛr a ɓatìghà girig ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a Bɛ̀ll. À ɓaghà di à mɛ rùn lɛɛ̀gwey; à ghɛɓkà bèg taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ wɔlɛ̀ngà ɓɛɛ̀ nyi ɓi rìgɔ̀n ɗii.

Fɔɔnnɛ à rɔ̀ɓkà ǹkpɔɓ; yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà min di à ti bèg mɛ̀tin mɛnin rì bèg yinin, nni à kɔ̀rìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ìsuùcèm, à kìkì Bɛ̀ll kìsay lɛ, rì ìru rì ŋwos; àa ǹti à cèlàg ɓìɗilàg ɓyààmɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, à ki ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔŋzàg.
Nni giɓ anɛ̀n à yùghày girig ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, à tum rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll rìkem, à ki kpaakpaa ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓoŋɓòŋgà gòri ì Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu Yorisalɛm kìɓan ki Yeesus.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yalì ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ legsìghà ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ ghɛɛsɛ̀ngà kì kìi lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Kan ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, nni ɓɛ sugtìghà rì nyi a Galile, ɓi ban ìnɛ ɓɛ kɔkɔ̀rìghà wɔɔ lɛ Naazarɛt.
Fɔɔnnɛ man ànɛn a tɔɔtɔ̀ɔ̀ghà à ki tèeteèsɛ̀n; à ɓaghà rì ɗyomzɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, Bɛ̀ll à ki keekeèsì nyi.
Ɓɛ̀yalì ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ ǹti ɓɛ kɛngì kì ɗiì Paskà a Yorisalɛm bèg yìcèm.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà di à ti bèg ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì yiɓɛɛ̀, nni ɓɛ kɛɛdìghà lɔŋ Paskà yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ǹkɛ̀ngì.
Yɛ̀ɛ tìcàɓ ti lekà, nni ɓɛ sukà, wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à man waà à rɔ̀ɓ yì a Yorisalɛm ɓɔ ɓɔ kɔɔ̀ yi.
Di ɓɛ mɛ kɛɛ̀ghi bimiɗ a ŋwos, ɓɛ fefèg lɛ Yeesus à rì ɓi kìtuu ki ɓum ki ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀zɛ̀ngà rì kɔ, nni ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìkaa, di ɓɛɛ tɔtɔg nyi rì ɓɔɔseŋi ɓaa, rì ɓisɛn ɓyaa.
Ɓaa rɔ̀ɓ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn nyi, nni ɓɛ sugtìghà min a Yorisalɛm di ɓɛɛ̀ tɔtɔ̀g.
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛɓɛɛ̀ nnɛ ɓɛ tanɛɛ nyi ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, à tɔtɔ̀g ɓɔ mɛ̀tɔɔ̀ghtɔɔgh, à ki wowog riɓàg ɗyaa.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ wowòkà ɓìtòkì ɓii ɓɛ kuuràkà coo ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗii, rì rìɓàg ɗi à ɓàɓàkà ɓumɓɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi, ɓɛ kuuràg lɛɛ̀gwey, nni jɛɛ à tɔkà nyi lɛ: Man wɛm̀, ù yeesii ɓà ɓisi fɛlɛ lɛ cɛ? Rì mɛ̀ rì soŋi tyàa tì mɛ̀rem aɗyòò lɛ ti kaakaa wɔ.
Nni à ɓakà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓyàa kaakaa mɛ̀? Ɓyàa yii ɓi lɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ nkiki ɓiɓan ɓi Seŋi wɛ̀m?
Kìɓan kìfog, ɓɛ yighà ɓì azi anɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ à kpaaghà ɓɔ ìnɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ à sugtìghà min ri ɓɔ a Naazarɛt, a kìkì ɓɔ mɛ̀wog; jɛɛ à ɓèŋɓèŋgà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓi ǹɗem.
Yeesus à tɔɔtɔ̀ɔ̀ghà, ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗii ɗi teèghtèghɛ̀n, Bɛ̀ll à keèkèèsì nyi, ɓum ɓɛ ki keekeèsì nyi girig.

Di Tìɓɛr ànɛ à ɓaghà rìfòm ɗigwey a ti ɓèg ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì yitaǹ ɓi rìlàmì, cààmɛ̀n kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Pɔŋs-Pilat à ɓaa gɔmìnà ànɛ a Zyude, Eroodɛ à làlamì Galile, geni ànɛ lɛ Filiɓ nyii lalàmì ɓìden ɓi zi ɓi lɛ, rì Iture rì Tirakonit, Lizanyas nyii lalàmì Abilɛn
An rì Kayif ɓɔɔ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey; nni Zyaŋ à man à Zakarii à wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll di à rì ɓi-reɓ.
Fɔɔnnɛ à tumɛ̀ngà rìrerènì ɗi kòdò ànɛ à rì jàŋbog rì Zyuridɛŋ, di a làalamɓɛ̀n lɛ, ɓum ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ ɓaɓtàg, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Bɛ̀ll a cenɛn ɓɔ ɓìɓe ɓyaa.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kì kànɛn ɓi kaàtà ɓìɓan ɓi à ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii lɛ: Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn ì rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì roànɛ a làalamɓɛ̀n yì ɓi-reɓ lɛ: Pègsɛɛna bee yi Kan bì rɛsàg yɔ lɛ saaɗ.
Ɓɛ ɓiì roozaagh ɓigbɔ̀g ɓìcèm, ɓɛ ɓùgsì lɛ rì dòn rì ɓìkèekèy, ɓɛ ki rɛsag ti ɓɛ̀kɔnà ɓɛ bee, ɓɛ tiìghgɛ̀n girig bee yi yi ri rì mɛ̀gbeŋ.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mum bimiɗ à ɓiì ghɛɛ gòri ì Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓum ɓɛ yuyùghày yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ ɓìtuu lɛ ɓìtuu, lɛ a ɓàɓti ɓɔ, nyii ki kpaakpàà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ pisɛɛ ɓìgòm ɓɛ! Ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ reɓi mìni lɛ ɓì rì lɛ ɓì ghɛŋì rìbaŋì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ɗi riì?

Nni kìina min ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ resi lɛ, ɓì mɛ lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn mɛrem; kɛ̀ ɓi kpaakpaa ɓi mɛ̀rem min lɛ: Abiraham à rì seŋi wìs a ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀; ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì lɛ à kì lɛ gɔ̀g yi yɛɛ ghas̀ ɓɔn ɓɛ Abiraham, mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ kpaa mìni.
Ɓi kiŋcèm, fìseŋ fi ti a ɓìte zi lɛ, kìte kicèm ki kii ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wum ɓiɗùn ɓi syeesyee, ɓɛ ɓiì kpɛ̀ɛ kɔ, ɓɛ wòn kɔ ɓi ɗuu.
Nni gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n ì tɔkà nyi lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ki tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ min ki kìi?
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓìlàà ɓiɓɛɛ̀, a fa gèni ànɛ à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ kɔ kìfog; ŋwaànɛ à rì rì ɓyom ɓi ɗiyɛn, a yiti gèni ànɛ à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ com.
Ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ ɓɛ yughày girig lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaɓti ɓɔ, nni ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, cɛ tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi?
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɓakà ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi sagtɛn com ɓi bàlì ì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ làmpoŋ̀ ìnɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì tɔɔ̀gh.

Ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ tɔkà girig nyi lɛ: Ɓìsi yòg, cɛ kɛɛ̀ki tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi? À kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓì ɓàtag mum com ɓi-tèɗ, kɛ̀ ɓi ki sɔmag mum di à kìi ɓi kiɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn; nyààrɛɛna rì mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ leɓkì mìni ɓi kìsay kin.
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓoŋɓòŋgà rì dyàɓɛn, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ fekì nya lɛ Zyaŋ nnyɛ̀ɛ ri Kiris.

Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà ɓɔɔ̀cèm lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓàaɓaɓtì mìni rì mɛ̀nig, kìɓan kifog ŋwaànɛ à cee mɛ̀ ɓi-tèɗ à tiì, ǹkpaŋi gì ɓi ɓi ǹkoŋ wulɛ m̀fùmì ǹɗig wii wu gòò. Nnyɛɛ ri mìni ɓiì ɓàɓtii ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, rì ɗuu.
À rìì rì mɛ̀tɛŋkɛlɛ mii ɓi càg, lɛ a ghasi lɛ rì ɓìfɛfɛy, rì gèŋ i cag cag; à ɓiì foŋi gèŋ ɓi kìkpoŋ kii; fɔɔnnɛ à ɓiì tɔ̀ni ɓifɛfɛy ɓi ɗuu ɗi ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗimi.
Zyaŋ à kpaakpaaghà kìlɔ̀ŋ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, à ki fafa ti ɓɔ deɓ yidɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey.
Kìɓan kifog Zyaŋ à rèsìghà gɔmìnà ànɛ lɛ Eroodɛ zɛ̀ɗ yiì, ɓi kìɓan ki Eroɗyaadɛ à gili gèni, rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓidɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi à kìghà.
Nni à kìtìghà tì kìɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn kidɛŋ, à foŋ Zyaŋ ɓi naà-zày.
Di ɓaa ɓàɓti kilɔ̀ŋ kìcèm, nni ɓɛ ɓaɓtìghà girig Yeesus. Yɛ̀ɛ à kìkìghà bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nni ɗyoo ɗi nɛmɓɛ̀ngà,
Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki sɛn yì nyi ɓi nyoo, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kuùkuù; fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓaghày ɓi ɗyoo lɛ: Ù rì Man wɛm̀ à ǹɗem, ɓi wɔ̀ nnɛ ǹfoŋi kìnyàà kɛm̀.
Yeesus à ɓaghà nunùg bèg rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ cààmɛ̀n ki à tumɛɛ kìsay kii, ɓum, ɓɔɔ fefèkà lɛ, à rì man à Yoosɛɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà man à Heli
Heli man à Matat, à man à Levi; Levi man à Mɛlki, Mɛlki man à Yanay, Yanay man à Yoosɛɓ.
Yoosɛɓ man à Matatyas à man à Amos, Amos man à Nawum, à man a Ɛsli; Ɛsli man à Nagayi
à man à Maat, à man à Matatyas, à man a Semeyin, à man à Yoosɛcɛ, à man à Yoda.
Yoda man à Yoanan, à man à Resa; Resa man à Zoroɓaɓɛl, à man à Salatyɛl, man à Neri,
à man à Mɛlki, à man à Aɗi, man à Kosam, à man à Ɛlmadam, à man à Ɛɛr;
Ɛɛr man, à Yeesus, à man à Elyezɛɛr, à man à Yorim, à man à Matat, à man à Levi;
Levi man a Simeyɔŋ, à man à Yuda, à man a Yoosɛɓ, à man à Yonam, à man à Elyakim;
Elyakim man à Meleya, à man à Mena, à man à Matata, à man à Nataŋ, man à Davit,
à man à Izayii, à man à Yoɓɛd, à man à Booz, à man à Salmɔn, à man à Naasɔn.
Naasɔn man à Aminadaɓ, à man à Admin, à man à Arni, à man à Ɛsrɔn, man à Farɛs, à man à Zyuda;
Zyuda man à Yakɔɓ, à man à Isag, à man à Abiraham, à man à Tera, à man à Nakɔr.
Nakɔr man à Serug, à man à Rehu à man à Pelɛg, à man à Eɓɛɛr, à man à Cilag
Cilag man à Kayinam, à man Arifasad, à man à Sɛm, à man à Nowe, à man à Lemɛg.
Lemɛg man à Matusalɛm, à man à Enɔg, man à Yerɛd, à man à Maleleyɛl, à man à Kenam.
Kenam man à Enos, à man à Sɛt, à man à Adam, à man à Bɛ̀ll.
Yeesus à sukày ɓi Zyuridɛŋ ǹɗonɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay; fɔɔnnɛ Nghay à tinìghà nyi lɛ a kɛǹ ɓi-reɓ.
Wɔɔ nnɛ Satàn a fèèghrɛ̀ngà nyi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀; à kɔ̀rìghà kɛ̀ɛ ɗi com ɓi mɛru mɛ̀n mɛ̀cèm. Nni yɛ̀ɛ mɛ ghaghìghà fɔɔnnɛ zày ì kɔngà nyi.
Nni Satàn a kpaaghà nyi lɛ: I ù yii lɛ ù rì Man à Bɛ̀ll, kali gɔ̀g ìnɛ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ghas̀ bìrɛs.
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Mum à yin lɛ à ghɛɓ lɛ bìrɛs yɔ̀ ri yɔ̀.
Nni Satàn a tekà nyi, à ɓɔgtɛ̀n tì rì nyi aɗyoo, à rèsì nyi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ziinɛ, ɓi maa kìden à cààmɛ̀n,
à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì faà rìkem rì ìkum wucèm wu ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi; lɛ ɓɛ faghà mɛ̀ ɓyɔ, ǹɗì girig lɛ ǹfa ɓyɔ rì ŋwaànɛ ǹkɔ̀ni lɛ ǹfa.
Ɓìcèm ɓi ri ɓiì wooghrɛɛ ri wɔ̀ di ù ɓaagh mɛ̀ mɛ̀ɗu asu.
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Ɓɔgsag Kan Bɛ̀ll wɔ̀ɔ̀, nyi nnɛ ù kì kìsay cɛ̀ncii.
Fɔɔnnɛ Satàn a kɛ̀ɛ̀dìtìghà rì Yeesus a Yorisalɛm, à ɓɔgsì nyi ɓi fìran fi naà-Bɛ̀ll à kpaa nyi lɛ: I ù yii lɛ ù rì Man à Bɛ̀ll, lɛla fɛ, u kɛǹ kì ciɓì ɓi zi.
Lɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à ɓiì reɓsii ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ̀ wɔ̀
rì tì lɛ: Ɓɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì lɛ̀ŋlɛŋi ɓi ɓyàg lɛ kɔ̀ɔ tuusi ikòò ɓi gɔ̀g.
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ki rì kì kànɛn lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ fèèghrɛn Kan Bɛ̀ll wɔ̀ɔ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ Satàn a lègsìghà nyi kìfèèghrɛɛ ɓi bee yiǹ yìcèm nni à ghaghìghà fìràɓ, à ɓoŋdì lɛ syeesyee à cààmɛ̀n àdɛŋ a ghɛnɛn.
Nni Yeesus à sugtìghà a Galile ǹɗonɛn ri ìtèɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay; fɔɔnnɛ rìkem ɗii ɗi saàghà ɓi kìlànà ki zi kiǹ kìcèm.
A rèrèsàkà ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi naa yi bɔŋ̀zɛ̀n, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ sɛsɛ̀g nyi.
Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà a Naazarɛt ɓi bàn ìnɛ à tɔɔghà wɔɔ, a ɗiŋì ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ àa nti à kìlàg ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ Saɓàt. Nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyòò lɛ a ɓay kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓɛ ceesìghà nyi kaàtà à ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan anɛ lɛ Ezayii, yɛ̀ɛ à ŋwàɗkà kaàtà ànɛn à tanɛ̀n jàŋ inɛ ì rì ǹkànɛn lɛ:

Nghay à Kan à rì ɓi mɛ̀ ɓisuulɛ à ɓɔngà mɛ̀ à siŋì mɛ̀ mɔ̀ɔ lɛ ǹkakàlì ɓɛ̀yɛɓàyɛɓa Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, à rom mɛ̀ lɛ, nghagsi ɓum ɓɛ naà-zày lɛ: ɓɛ ɓiì kpagii naà-zày; à rom dì mɛ̀ lɛ, ǹkpaà ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì ghɛnɛɛ ti; ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ kìki mɛtɔɓ m̀pisì ɓɔ ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ,
rì tì lɛ, ǹlam̀ɓɛn lɛ, bèg ìnɛ Kan à ɓiì rèsii geesɛ̀n yìì i kpaŋi.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà kìtaàgh kaàtà, à ceesì nyi rì ǹkìì-kìsay, à kɔ̀rì min ɓi zi. Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓanɓàngà nyi rì mis lɛ tɔ̀n tɔ̀n tɔ̀n!
Nni à tumɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rìkpaa lɛ: Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ɓì woogh ìnɛ̀n di m̀ɓàli, ì roni gɛɛ̀nɛ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ sɛsɛ̀kà nyi, ɓɛ ki kuukuùghràg ɓɛ̀syeesyee ɓɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ à kpaakpaaghà, di ɓɛɛ tɔtɔg lɛ: Àa man à Yoosɛɓ yɛɛ ri lɛ?
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹ-yii saaɗ lɛ, ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓiì terì dàɗkì ìnɛ lɛ: Wɔ̀ m̀ɓoò-ɓum, ɓoorɛn wɛ̀ɛmiɗ; ɓìɓan ɓi tì wokà lɛ, ù kìghà a Kapɛrinawum, kìya girig ɓyɔ fɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ.
Nni à kpaatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ: Ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a maà kem ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii.

Saaɗ innɛ ǹkpaa mìni lɛ: Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Eli, mɛ̀kpɔɓ mɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ mɛ ronɛ̀ngà a Isirayɛl ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki bwey yi kosɛ̀ngà à kpaŋ bèg yìraa rì kìden. Zày ì kìghà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm.
Kìɓan kifog, Bɛ̀ll à romgà ɓi Eli yɛ̀ɛ kibog ki ɓi mɛ̀kpɔɓ mɛǹ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkpɔɓ wu giɓ wu wu ɓaghà a Sarɛɓta, ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki lɛ Sidɔŋ innɛ à romgà nyi.
Ɓɛkukwiy ɓɛ ronɛ̀ngà girig a Isirayɛl ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ànɛ lɛ Elize, kìɓan kifog, ǹsoò kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ ki wɔngà ɓi, i ki cee ɓi lɛ Naman ŋwaànɛ a Sirii.
Mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓeɓtɛ̀ngà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìnɛn yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ.
Nni ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà ɓɛ kpaŋzì nyi ɓi bàn, ɓɛ kɛ̀n ɗì nyi ɓi bèn ì dòn lɛ bàn yàà inɛn ì ɓaghà ǹtoŋɛn ɓi dòn aɗyoo lɛ di ɓɛɛ tyɔg nyi wɔɔ, a kɛǹ kìkpìi azi
kìɓan kìfog, à fyeeghà ɓɔ ɓi nyìinyìm à ghaàgh nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à sɛngà a Kapɛrinawum ànɛ à ɓaghà bàn ìnɛ a Galile, à rèèrèsàg ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ŋwosi Saɓàt.
Ɓum ɓɛ kuuràkà rìkuu ɗii ɗi rirèsì, ɓisuulɛ, à tòtòkà rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rìlàmì.
Nni wɔɔ ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìnɛn, ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay; ŋwaàncèm à tumɛ̀ngà rìlàmɓɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ:
Aàgh! Yeesus ànɛ a Naazarɛt, ki ri wɔ̀ la ri ɓìsi? Ù yuuyì kɔ̀m fɛ lɛ u cuusi ɓìsi? Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii lɛ ù rì roànɛ à rì ǹtɛnɛn, ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à romiì.

Yeesus à fwaàdɛ̀ngà kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay kìn, à kpaa kɔ lɛ: Sìmdi ŋwɔm, u ki kpaŋ ɓi ŋwaànɛ; nni kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay ki rogà ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓi zi ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, ki kpaŋ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki nyi com.
Nni ìris wu ɓangà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ tum rìkpaakpàà wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗi be ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ! Ghɛɛna yɛ̀ɛ à fwààdɛɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ìtèɗ wu rilàmì, ɓi ki kpagi!
Nni rìkem ɗii ɗi saàghà min jàŋ bimiɗ ɓi kìlànà ki zi kiǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nni à kɛ̀ngà a mɛɛ mɛ Simɔn, à tanɛ̀n jɛɛ gili Simɔn di à rì rì kìfɛɓ ɓi nyoo lɛɛ̀gwey; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà Yeesus lɛ a ghɛɓsi nyi.
Nni Yeesus à loŋmɛ̀ngà giɓ anɛ̀n ɓi nyoo, à fwààdɛ̀n kìfɛɓ ki ki ɓaghà nyi ɓi nyoo kìn, kìfɛɓ ki lèg, giɓ a ghàs kì pɛ̀sɛɛ aɗyoo, à tumɛ̀n ɓyom ɓi kìyɛn lɛ a kaà ɓɔ.
Di ŋwos a mɛ nɔ̀ŋì, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓɛ̀roroɓ mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu, ɓɛ yughày nyi rì ɓɔ, fɔɔnnɛ à sasàghìghà ɓɔ ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, a wɔ̀ɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓɔ.

Ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi kpaŋkpàŋgà girig ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi nyoo, di ɓyɛɛ̀ syaasyaàdɛ̀n ɓi kpaakpàà lɛ: Ù rì Man à Bɛ̀ll, wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus kɛ̀ɛ fa ɓyɔ bee ìnɛ lɛ, ɓyɛɛ toòghrɛn, ɓisuulɛ ɓi yighà lɛ nnyɛɛ ri Kiris.
À faŋìghà kì kɛ̀ɛ ɓi kìlɛŋ ki jàŋ sariwa lɛ ɓuɓ; nni ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìkaa, yɛ̀ɛ ɓi tanɛ̀ngà nyi, ɓɛ kɔǹ lɛ ɓɛɛ cɛɛ̀zi nyi kɛ̀ɛ ghaghi à càɗ ɓɔ.
Kìɓan kìfog Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ǹghagsi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ɓi bàn yimbog, lɛ kìɓan kiǹ kɛ̀ɛ̀ki Bɛ̀ll à romgày mɛ̀ miì.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kakàlìghà ɓum Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yi a Galile.
Ŋwos adɛŋ, Yeesus à ɓaghà ɓi ǹwɔŋì wu riɓày ànɛ a Zyenezarɛt, fɔɔnnɛ gwìy ì kɔ̀mzɛ̀ngà nyi, ɓum ɓɛ tyɔɔ̀tyɔ̀ɔ̀rɛ̀n, lɛ ɓɛɛ wog ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll,
nni à ghɛngà ɓìkɔm ɓiɓɛɛ̀ ɓi bèn ì rìɓày. Ɓɛ̀pììgh-dam ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓyɔ, ɓɛ sɛngà lɛ ɓɛɛ cug dam yaa.
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔm kìfog, ki ki ɓaghà ki Simɔn, à tɔg Simɔn lɛ, a raɓsɛn tìì rì bèn ì mɛ̀nig lɛsàg; nni à kɔ̀rìghà min ɓi kìkɔm, à tumɛ̀n rìrèsàg ɗi gwìy ì ɓum.
Yɛ̀ɛ à lègsìghà ɓìtòkì, nni à kpaaghà Simɔn lɛ: Tyɛ̀ɛ̀ti kìkɔm ɓi dim ì rìɓày, ɓi pìg dam wɔɔ, ɓi ɓan ɓìzɛn.
Simɔn à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, tyàa lali cem ɓi dam ì m̀pìghɛn, tyɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓan com, nni ǹɗì ɓiì pìigh dam lɛ yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ kpaa.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ pikà dam, nni ɓɛ ɓangà ɓìzɛn lɛɛ̀gwey lèg ànɛ lɛ dam yaa yi tuùtùnɛ̀ngà.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ reŋighà ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi kìkɔm kimbog rì kuriɓàɓ lɛ ɓɛɛ yu ɓɔ kì gheŋzii ritùg ɗi ɓìzɛn; ɓɛ yuis̀, ɓɛ roòzì ɓìzɛn ɓi ɓìkɔm ɓi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀, lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓi tumɛ̀ngà rì ɓim.
Yɛ̀ɛ Simɔn Pyɛɛri à ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, nni à ɓakà Yeesus mɛ̀ɗu asu, à kpaa lɛ: Kan, pɛ̀sɛn mɛ̀ jàŋbog, ɓisuulɛ ǹɗì ǹkìì-kìɓe.
A kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, ìris wu ɓangà lɛ, rì Simɔn, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓɔ, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ɓangà ɓìzɛn lɛɛ̀gwey.

Ìris wu ɓaadìghà girig ɓɔn ɓɛ Zeɓede ɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ lɛ rì Zyag rì Zyaŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀reŋkàŋ ɓɛ Simɔn. Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà Simɔn lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ risi, à tumɛɛ gɛɛ̀nɛ, ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ù rì ɓiì ɓwemɓwemi ɓi sig à ɓìzɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ sugtighày rì ɓìkɔm a cɛɗ, nni ɓɛ càɗkà ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì Yeesus.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà ɓì bàn ìdɛŋ, nni ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ kwiy à ɗyɛɛrɛ̀ngà nyoo bimiɗ à ghɛngà nyi, à kpì nyi a mɛ̀kòò, à ɓag ìsu ɓi zi, à ɓɔŋzì nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, i ki kɔni wɔ̀, kìya ɓà lɛ mɓati lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yɛ̀m.
Nni Yeesus à nàmgà càg, à kòm nyi, à kpaa lɛ: Ki kɔni mɛ̀ fɔlɔɔ, ɓati lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀; kwiy a ghàs nyi kì lèegh ɓi nyòò.

Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à siitàkà nyi lɛ: Kɔɔ ɓùŋ mum kìɓan ki, wɔ̀lɛ, kɛ̀na ki rèsɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ Pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀, u funɛn com ɓisuu zòghɛ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Moyis à kàngà, rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ resi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ ù mɛ wɔ̀n.
Rìkem ɗi Yeesus ɗi kɛnkɛ̀ngà lɔŋ asu di ɗyɛɛ̀ sààsàà. Ɓum ɓɛ nti ɓɛ taŋzàg ɓyoo gwìy lɛ ɓɛɛ wowog ɓìtòkì ɓii, rì tì lɛ, a wɔɔ̀zi ɓɔ tìroɓ tyaa.
Kìɓan kifog Yeesus nyii ǹti à kɛ̀ngì ɓi ɓìlɛŋ ɓi jaŋ, à kìkì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n wɔɔ.

Ŋwos adɛŋ, Yeesus à rèrèsàkà ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛngày ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ a Galile, rì ɓɛ a Zyude rì ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ kɔkɔ̀rìghà wɔɔ. Ìtèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll wu wu ɓaghà ɓi Kan wu kikìghà lɛ, a wɔɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓum.
Nni ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ tɛkày mum ànɛ à yitìghà ɓi rikɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi kon, ɓɛ kaakàà bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗiŋi rì nyi ɓi naa, di ɓɛɛ ŋɔŋzi Yeesus nyi asu.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓi bee inɛ ɓɛɛ ɗiŋzi ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ gwìy ì ceeghà, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓɔkà rì nyi a bwèy, ɓɛ rɔŋzìì ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓi ɗyas ǹkàŋɛn ɓi kon, ɓɛ ki sɛɛdii nyi asuu Yeesus, ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓumɓɛ̀n, nni à kpaaghà ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ: Tɛɛnɛ, ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓìcenɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìŋwɔ̀ŋwɔ̀ŋì di ɓɛɛ fèfeg ɓi mɛ̀rem maa lɛ ghɛn yɛɛ ri lɛ à cenɛ̀n ɓum ɓìɓe, i ki cee ɓi lɛ Bɛ̀ll cɛ̀ncii?
Yeesus à yighà ɓɛ̀fèg ɓaa, fɔɔnnɛ à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓì rì rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ mɛyitì mɛǹ ɓi mɛ̀rem?
Rì rìkpaa ɗì lɛ: Ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓìcenɛn, rì ɗi lɛ pɛ̀sɛn aɗyòò u kɛɛghi, ɗibe ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ?
Nkɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓi yi lɛ, Man à mum à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ à cenɛ̀n ɓum ɓìɓe fɛ ɓi ziinɛ. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à kpaaghà min kisɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ lɛ: Nkpaa wɔ̀ lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyòò, u teɗ kon wɔɔ̀ u kɛǹ a mɛɛ.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghàskà ki pɛ̀sɛɛ aɗyoo ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à teɗ kon anɛ à ɓaghà miì ǹnɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn, à ròŋì bee inɛ a mɛɛ mii, di a fafa Bɛ̀ll rìkem.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kuuràkà, ɓɛ ki keekemzì Bɛ̀ll. Iris wu rongà ɓɔ ɓi nɗem ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ, tì ghɛɛ ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓi ŋwos a gɛɛ̀nɛ.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus à kpagà ɓi dan à ghɛn ǹterì-làmpoŋ̀ àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Levi, di à kɔ̀kɔrii a-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu kisay. Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀.
Nni Levi à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyòò, à càɗ ɓyom ɓii ɓìcèm, à nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ngà rì Yeesus a mɛɛ mii, à taŋzɛ̀n coo kisɛ̀nɛ̀: Ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ lɛɛ̀gwey rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɔ.

Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìŋwɔ̀ŋwɔ̀ŋì di ɓɛɛ tɔtɔg ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi kìki lɛ, ɓì ɗiɗì, ɓì ki nɔnɔ ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe?
Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ ɓalàg ɗì zày ì dɔgtà, àa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ rì lɛ syeesyee.
Ǹ-yùghà ɓi ki reŋii ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ saaɗ, lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ǹ-yùghà kì reŋii.
Ɓum ɓɛ kpaaghà Yeesus lɛ: Ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓidɛŋ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ celàg ɓìɗilàg, ɓɛ kikì bɔŋzɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ girig, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛnkɔɔ ɓɔɔ ɗiɗì, ɓɛ ki nɔnɔ (cààmɛ̀n kìcèm).
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì rì nya lɛ ɓì kɔ̀ɔ̀sì ɓɛ̀reŋkàŋ ɓɛ ǹwɔlì giɓ zày, di ǹwɔlì giɓ a kaka rì ɓɔ?
Cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓatɛn ɓɔ ǹwɔlì giɓ ki tiì, mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n mɛɛ̀mɛ ɓɛ ri cèli ɓiɗilàg miì.

Nni à teɗtìghà ɓɔ dàɗkì lɛ: Ɓaà ghàs ɓi zyònà ì kìlàà ì nyɔn ɓɛ raɗkì ki kitùg miì, ì ɓɛ kii fɔlɔɔ, ki nyɔn ki tùnɛ̀n, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki wɔɔsɛn lɛ rì zyònà ì nyɔn, rì kìtùg ki kilàà.
Ɓaà ɓèni ɓi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ nyɔn ɓi ɓìtùg ɓi ɓiren, lɛ mɛ ri ɓiì ki weeyii ɓìren, mɛ soɓɓàg, ɓìren ɓìcèm ɓi ɗyoŋ;
kìɓan kifog ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì foŋì mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ nyɔn ɓi ɓìren ɓi nyɔ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à mɛ mɛ̀ɛ̀zi ŋwɔm ɓi tìɗyàɓ ti mɛrɔ̀g, à ti kɛ̀ɛ kɔ̀ɔ̀di mɛ mɛ kaka nyɔn, lɛ mɛ abɛ̀y mɛɛ rɔɔtɛɛ ɓi rìghɛn ɗii.
Ŋwosi Saɓàt àdɛŋ, Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà ɓi dɛmi nyas, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ kɛɛnkɛ̀n di ɓɛɛ sòsori nyas, ɓɛ pyepyèg rì ɓyàg di ɓɛɛ ɗiɗì.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi kìki ɓìɓan ɓi mum à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki kìi ŋwosi Saɓàt?
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì ka ɓalà ɓi kiɓan ki Davit a kìghà ŋwos adɛŋ di zày ì kɔ̀ni lɛ, rì nyi rì ɓum ɓii?
Yɛ̀ɛ Davit à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll à teɗ bìrɛs yi ɓɛ faghà ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ɗi yɔ rì ɓum ɓii, kɔm̀ lɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ cɛ̀ncaa ɓɛɛ ɓaghà lɛ, ɓɛ ɗi bìrɛs yiǹ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Man à mum à làmii Saɓàt.
Ɓi gòn i Saɓàt ìdɛŋ, Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìdɛŋ, à tum ɗì rèsàg ɗi ɓum; nni ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ, càg ki weèlem kìɓɔmɛn.
Ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ fifìɓìghà nyi lɛ fyɛɛyi, lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ ǹkòo à ɓiì wɔ̀ɔ̀zii mum ŋwosi Saɓàt, lɛ ɓɛ kaakààghà kìɓan ki ɓɛɛ ɓanɛn mii lɛ ɓɛɛ sɔmɛn nyi.
Kìɓan kifog, Yeesus à yighà ɓɛ̀fèg ɓaa, nni à kpaaghà ŋwaà càg kiɓɔmà lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyòò, u rɛli fɛ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum; nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyòò, à rɛlì wɔɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Kaliina ɓà mɛ, ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi kalii lɛ, ɓi gòn i Saɓàt, mum a ki kìɓe gìn kìrɔɔ? Lɛ a ghɛɓsi mum gìn, a caɗ nyi lɛ a wu?
Nni Yeesus a seesèèghà ɓɔɔ̀cèm, à kpaa min ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ: Nàma càg kɔɔ, ŋwaà nàm, càg ki ghàs kì ɓaà lɛ syeesyee.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wokà bim, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìnyoònyòlɛ̀n ɓi com ki ɓɛ rì ɓiì kìi Yeesus.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ innɛ Yeesus à ɓɔkà ki ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh ɓi dòn aɗyòò, à ghagsì ìru wùcèm ɓi rìɓɔ̀ŋzì ɗi Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓi duri tana, à reŋìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓiì, à ɓɔ̀n ɓum miì ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à ròò ɓɔ ɗii lɛ, ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom.
Ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ: Rì Simɔn ànɛ à roòghà lɛ Pyɛɛri, rì Andire à geni, rì Zyag, rì Zyaŋ, rì Filiɓ rì Batelemi,
rì Matyoo, rì Tomas, rì Zyag à man à Alfe, rì Simɔn ànɛ à ɓaghà Zelot
rì Zyudɛ à man à Zyag, rì Zyudas Iskariyot ànɛ à ki ghalà lɛ à tɔ̀kɛɛ Yeesus.

Nni Yeesus à sɛngày rì ɓɔ, à rɛlì ɓi lɛ̀gsì, jàŋ inɛ coo gwìy ì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii i ɓaghà, rì gɛ mum ànɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Zyude, rì a Yorisalɛm, rì ɓi bèn ì rìɓày ànɛ a Tiir, rì Sidɔŋ.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ yughày lɛ ɓɛɛ wowog ɓìtòkì ɓi Yeesus, à ki wɔ̀ɔ̀zi ɓɔ tìroɓ tyaa, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi yeèyèèsìghà, ɓɛ wɔngà girig.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kaakààghà lɛ ɓɛɛ kòm nyi, ɓisuulɛ ìtèɗ wudɛŋ wu kpaŋkpàŋgày nyi ɓi nyoo, wu wɔɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓɔɔ̀cèm.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à pɛɓsɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mààgh rì mìni ɓɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha ɓisuulɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki ri kiŋkìn.
Mààgh rì mìni ɓɛ ɓi wowog zày ɓigomìnɛ, ɓisuulɛ ɓì ɓiì wurii! Mìni ɓɛ ɓi rènɗen ɓigomìnɛ, mààgh rì mìni lɛ ɓì rì ɓiì wɔ̀li.
I ɓum ɓɛ ɓeèzɛɛ mìni, ɓɛ ɓèn mìni, ɓɛ sɛmgì mìni, ɓɛ ki ren mini ɗii ɓi ǹɗaŋ waa, ɓisuu Man à mum, ɓì ɓiì ɓaa rì ɓɛ̀mààgh.
Nyàànyaana, ɓì ki sànsam ɓi ŋwos anɛ̀n, lɛ mɛ̀lèɓ min mɛ aɗyoo mɛ teghɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey; lɛ fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓaa ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ tɔtɔ̀ɓkà ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Wɔ̀lɛ nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ̀guŋgum, lɛ mìnii ti rì gàɓ yìn i kìnyàà!
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ ɓì mɛ wuràg ɓigomìnɛ, lɛ ɓì rì wog zày! Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ ɓi wɔ̀wɛy ɓigomìnɛ, lɛ ɓì biì ɓaa rì ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn ɓì ki rèn.
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni, di ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ̀ sɛsɛg mini, lɛ fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓaa ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ sɛsɛ̀kà ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà ɓɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Wɔ̀lɛ, ǹkalii mìni ɓɛ ɓi wowog mɛ lɛ, keesiina ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓin, ɓì kì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓèeɓeèzɛ̀n mìni kìrɔɔ.
Màŋina ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ cɛmgì mìni, ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg ɓisuu ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tɔtɔɓ mini.
I mum à ɓoogh wɔ̀ ɓi rìtam ɗi kimɛŋ, fati nyi ɗi weèlem; i ŋwaà ɓàtɛɛ wɔ̀ rìga, càra nyi a teèti bùɓi yɔ̀ɔ̀.
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à lɔni wɔ̀ com, faa nyi kɔ̀, fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓàtɛɛ wɔ̀ com, kɔ̀ɔ tɔg nyi lɛ a pɛɛ̀zi wɔ̀ kɔ.
Kìɓan ki ki kɔni wɔ̀ lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kilag wɔ̀, wɔ̀ kìlàg girig ɓɔ kɔ̀.
I ɓi keesii lɔŋ lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ keesii mìni, kìɓan ki kuurakɛn kaa ɓa ɓi a lɔ̀ŋkin, lɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛ ti ɓɛ keesàg girig ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ keesii ɓɔ.
I ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg mìni kìrɔɔ ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓì ti ɓì kìlàg kìrɔɔ, di ɓì ka ki ɓi kiɓan ki kuurakɛn, lɛ ǹsoò ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg fɔlɔɔ.

I ɓumɓɛ ɓì yii lɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ leɓ mìni pon ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓì ti ɓì ɓɔ̀ràg ɓyom, kìɓan kidɛŋ ki kuurakɛn ki yin foo, lɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓɔràg ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓyom lɔŋ lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɔ ɓyɔ ɓiì pɛ̀ɛ̀zii.

Kìɓan kifog, keesiina ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓin, ɓì kìkì ɓɔ kìrɔɔ, ɓì ki ɓɔ̀rag ɓum ɓyom, kɛ̀ ɓi mìngi tityɛɛ lɛ, ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì pɛ̀ɛ̀zii ɓyɔ. I ɓì kìi fɔlɔɔ, mɛ̀lèɓ min mɛ ri ɓiì tèghɛɛ, ɓì ki ɓa ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg ɓisuulɛ, nyii rilàg rì geesɛ̀n ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛ̀tènteǹ rì ɓɛ̀kìì-rìgɛn.
Ɓaana rì ǹɗem wu nyìighnyìg lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi wìn a rì rì ǹɗem wu nyìighnyìg.
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mì ɓum fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll àa yɔ̀m ɓì mini; kɛ̀ ɓi fa ɓum zɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll àa fa ɓi mini zɔɔ; cenɛɛna ɓɛ̀geni ɓin, fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì mìni ɓiì cenɛɛ.

Faana ɓum ɓyom fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì girig mìni ɓiì faà ɓi coo vèg ìnɛ ì rì ǹɗonɛn lɛ pisa, ì ki ɓa ǹnɔ̀rakɛn, ì rààràà; vèg ìnɛn yɛɛ̀nɛ ɓɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì sùùrii ɓyom ɓi ɓàm à kìlàà kɔɔ; ɓisuulɛ vèg ìnɛ ù ti ù fèkì ɓɛ̀ro ɓyom miì, yɛ̀ɛnɛ ɓɛ ri girig wɔ̀ ɓyɔ ɓiì fèegh miì.
Nni Yeesus à teetìghà ɓɔ dàɗkì ìdɛŋ lɛ: Ɗyaŋɗyàŋ à rì nya lɛ à ɓan roɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓi kìgeŋ, ɓɛ rɔɓ lɛ ɓɛ kpii ɓi ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi rìɓee?
N-yilàg à yin lɛ à cee ǹɗèsàg wìì, kìɓan kifog, i à kpaŋzɛɛ cilag kii, à rì lɛ à ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗèsàg wìì.
Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ù ghɛɛ kìfɛfɛy ki ki ri ɓi ɗis ɗi goni, kɔ̀ɔ ghɛn ǹwɔ̀g wu wu ri ɓi ɗiǹkɔ̀ɔ̀?

Nsoò lɛ: Lannɛ ù rì lɛ ù kpaa goni lɛ, maasòŋ, kìya m̀pisi wɔ̀ kìfɛfɛy ki wɔ̀ ɓi ɗis, kɔm̀ lɛ ù ghɛɛ ɓi nwɔ̀g wu wu ri ɓi ɗiǹkɔ̀ɔ̀? Wɔ̀ ŋwaà fyɛy fyɛy ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm! Ka pisi ǹwɔ̀g wu wu ri wɔ̀ ɓi ɗis, di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ u konag kì ghɛɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ u pisi kìfɛfɛy ki ki ri ɓi ɗis ɗi goni.
Syeesyee à kìte a maà wum ɓi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɗùn, ǹsoò kìɓeɓtàg ki kite, ki yin lɛ ki wum ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓiɗùm.
Lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ yilag kite kicèm ɓi ɓìɗùn ɓi kɔ. Ŋwaà yin lɛ à kɔs dii ɓi ǹɗyèm wu gay, ǹsoò lɛ à kɔs gin ɓi nɗyèm wu keŋ.

Syeesyee à mum à ti à kìlàg ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee lɛ, à rì rì syeesyee à ǹɗem; kìɓeɓtàg ki mum ki kilàg ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn lɛ, ki ri rì kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹɗem, lɛ ŋwɔm wu mum wɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa kiɓan ki ki roni nyi ǹɗem.
Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi rereŋi mɛ lɛ Kan, Kan, kɛ̀ ɓi ki kì com ki ǹkpaa mìni?
Ǹɗì lɛ ǹkpaa mìni lɛ, mum bimiɗ ànɛ à yùu a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, à wog rìrèsàg ɗyɛm̀, à ki nɔ̀ɔ̀ti ɗyɔ,

à pisɛɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi kìtoŋ ki mɛɛ; à timgà zi, à kpaŋ ɓi rìɓan à ghɛ̀lɛ̀n yì kìtoŋ miì aɗyòò; yɛ̀ɛ don yi mɛnig yi kpagà, poɓɓo à yù kì roŋdɛɛ ɓi mɛɛ mɛǹ, kìɓan kifog, mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nyɛ̀ŋɗɛn, lɛ mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀ toŋɛn lɛ syeesyee.

Nni wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à woogh rìrèsàg ɗyɛm̀, kɛ̀ɛ nɔ̀ɔ̀ti ɗyɔ, à pisɛɛ ŋwaànɛ à saghìghà mɛɛ mii ɓi m̀bume aɗyòò, kɛ̀ɛ tim lɛ a ghɛlɛn yì kìtoŋ ɓi zi i nteɗ. Yɛ̀ɛ poɓɓo à roŋɗɛ̀ngà miì, mɛ ghas kì kpìlaagh, mɛ waàrɛ̀n mɛ̀cèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à lègsìghà kì kalii ɓiɓan ɓi à ɓaghà lɛ a kpaa gwìy ì ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ, fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ngà a Kapɛrinawum.
Muu Ròmɛŋ àdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà, à ɓaghà rì ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ à keesìghà lɛɛ̀gwey; nni ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ̀n à roròɓkà, di à ti ɓiì kɔ̀ɔkɔɔ̀sì.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà ànɛn à wokà rìkem ɗi Yeesus, nni à pɛ̀sìghà ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ, à rom ɓɔ a lɔŋ̀kii, lɛ ɓɛɛ kpaa nyi lɛ, à yu kì ghɛɓsii ǹkìì-kìsay wiì.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kpagà Yeesus a nyoo, nni ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàkà nyi, ɓɛ siìrɛ̀n rìkpaa lɛ: Tààta! Ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà ànɛ kìɓan ki à tɔɔgh wɔ̀ ki,
ɓisuulɛ, à keesii kìlɔ̀ŋ kis, nnyɛɛ ki togà naa yìs i bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n.

Nni ɓɛ sugtɛ̀ngà min ɗi Yeesus, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ti jàŋbog rì mɛɛ nni ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà à romgày ɓɛ̀reŋkàŋ ɓii lɛ ɓɛɛ kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Tɛɛnɛ, kɔ̀ɔ teki ǹtɔɓ wìn; lɛ ǹkpaŋi ɓi rikuu ɗi mum ɗi lɛ ù ɗiŋì ɓi naa yɛ̀m.
Fɔɔnnɛ màa ghɛɛ lɛ, ǹkpaŋi ɓi ɓi ǹɗɛli wulɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ n-yù wɔ̀ jàŋbog, kìɓan kifog, kali lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ŋwɔm, di ǹkìì-kìsay wɛm̀ a wɔǹ.

Lɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ ǹɗì rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kɔmɛɛ mɛ̀; ǹki ɓa ti ri ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ mɛ̀ ǹkɔ̀mɛɛ; i ǹkpaa adɛŋ lɛ kɛ̀na! à kɛ̀n; ǹki kpaati ambog lɛ a yu, à yù; ǹsoò màa kpaa ǹkìì-kìsay wɛm̀ lɛ, kìya fɛlɛ, à kì fɔlɔɔ.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà ɓìɓan ɓi ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà à kpaaghà ɓiǹ, à kuuràkà nyi; fɔɔnnɛ à nìmɓɛ̀ngà à fa mis rì gwìy ì ɓum à kpaa lɛ: Mìni ɓum, ǹsoò a Isirayɛl, ǹka ghɛngà ɓi mum ànɛ à rì rì coo rìgherɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ŋwaànɛ.
Nni ɓumɓɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà à romgày, ɓɛ sugtìghà a mɛɛ mii, ɓɛ tanɛ̀n lɛ, ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ à roròɓkà à mɛ wɔ̀n.
Ɓi duri tana, Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà min ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Nayin. À ɓaghà ǹɗaŋ lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, rì coo kituu ki ɓum.

Yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà di à ti jàŋbog rì ìsuunaa wu ɓi rìɗìŋɗàg ɗi bàn ìnɛn, nni ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀ngà kì ɓomi kìloŋ ki mum; mum àncèm à ɓaghà m̀bobog à man à ǹkpɔɓ wu giɓ wudɛŋ. Ɓumɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn, lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀zɛ̀ngày ǹɗaŋ rì ǹkpɔɓ wiǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Kan à ghɛngà giɓ anɛ̀n, à wog nyi nyìighnyìg, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ rènɗen.
Fɔɔnnɛ à tyoŋdɛ̀ngà, à kòm fìkɔrɔŋ fi kilòn; ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ tɛtɛ̀kà fyɔ ɓɛ rɛlì, Yeesus à kpaa lɛ: Dɛlì ì mum, ǹkpaa wɔ̀ lɛ, pɛ̀sɛn aɗyòò!
Nni kìloŋ ki pɛsɛ̀ngà kìkɔ̀ɔ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀, ki tumɛn ɓìtòkì, Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi rì jɛɛ.

Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ, ɓɛ ghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ koŋnyòò. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ keèkèmzìghà Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Coo ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a ghɛnɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkis, rì tì lɛ Bɛ̀ll à yùu kì ghɛɓsii kilɔ̀ŋ kii.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n à sààghà lɛ rì ɓi zi ì Zyude bimiɗ, rì ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓi ɓaghà wɔɔ nunùg.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ ɓɛ kɛngà nyi kì kpaà gɛ ɓìɓan anɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ Zyaŋ à reŋìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à rom ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ Kan, lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri nya roànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yùu gìn, ti ɓoŋ̀ɓoŋ tì roàdɛŋ?
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Zyaŋ Bàɓtis yɛɛ romiì ɓìsi lɛ, tì tɔg wɔ̀ lɛ: Wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri nya roànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yùu, gìn ti ɓoŋ̀ɓoŋ tì ŋwaàdɛŋ?
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, Yeesus à wɔ̀ɔ̀zìghà ɓɛ̀roroɓ lɛɛ̀gwey, rì ɓɛ̀lɛnlɛm, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay, à ki kì lɛ, ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ghɛnɛ̀n tì.

Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà ɓumɓɛ Zyaŋ à romgày ɓɛǹ a lɔ̀ŋkii lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna kì kpaà Zyaŋ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓì ghɛɛ, rì ɓi ɓì woogh; ɓyɛɛ ri lɛ: ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛ ghɛɛghɛnɛ̀n tì, ɓɛ̀lɛnlɛm ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ syeesyee, ɓɛ̀kukwiy ɓɛ teètèètì syeesyee à nyoo, ɓɛ̀lɔlɔg ɓɛ woòwòòghrɛ̀n, ɓìloŋ ɓì gheèghèmɓɛ̀n, Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kaàkàlɛ̀n a ɓɛ̀soghàsogha.
Nni mààgh rì ŋwaànɛ àa kɛ̀ɓtɛn ɓi fiɓàg lɛ mɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ fìtom ɓɛ Zyaŋ ɓɛ sugtìghà, nni Yeesus à tumɛ̀ngà ɓum rì kpaa ɗi kiɓan ki Zyaŋ, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì kɛ̀ngà kì ghɛɛ̀ ɓi-reɓ? Kìsyòŋ ki fɛ̀ɛ̀fɛ̀ɛ̀ a nyɛ̀ɛnyɛŋzì gìn?
Nni cɛ ɓi kɛ̀ngà kì ghɛɛ̀, ɓaà yi ɓi ŋwaànɛ à rì ǹɗɛ̀ŋɗɛn lɛ syeesyee? Kìɓan kifog ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀rɛ̀ŋɗɛn, lɛ syeesyee ɓɛ ki ghɛghɛɓ ɓi-kum, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kɔràg ɓi mɛɛ mɛ mɛfòm.
Nni cɛ ɓì kɛ̀ngà min ki ghɛɛ̀? Ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan? Ɛ̀ɛ̀! Ǹkalii mìni lɛ, ŋwaànɛ ɓi ghɛngà ànɛn à cee gì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Ɓisuulɛ Zyaŋ yɛ̀ɛ rì roànɛ ɓɛ kangà ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll lɛ: Ghɛna ǹɗomi mum wɛm̀ à fìtom wɔ asu lɛ a pegsɛn wɔ̀ bee.
Ǹkpaa mìni lɛ, ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ yalɛ̀ngà ɓi ɗùm ɗi giɓ, ŋwaànɛ à cee Zyaŋ à yin; kìɓan kifog siitòn a mum ànɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll à cee nyi.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ wowòkà ɓìtòkì ɓi Zyaŋ, ǹsoò ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀, ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì lɛ saaɗ; kɛɛ kìghà lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ, Zyaŋ a ɓaɓti ɓɔ.
Kìɓan kifog, Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓengà fèg ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓaghà rì nyi ɓisu waa, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓengà kì kɛ̀ɛ lɛ Zyaŋ a ɓaɓti ɓɔ.
Nni ǹɗì lɛ ǹfèg ɓà gbàà ì ɓum ì gɛɛ̀nɛ rì cɛ? Ì pisɛɛ ɓà rìkuu ɗi ɓum aɗi?
Ì pisɛɛ ɓɔɔɓɔɓti ɓɛ ɓɛ kɔkɔ̀rii ɓi ǹlɛm̀ɓog; ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kakàlì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa lɛ: Tì mɛ kì lɛ, tì ɓog mìni mɛ̀keŋ, kɛ̀ ɓi ɗyen, tì kɛɛ̀gh mìni kìɓààsì ki riwù, kɛ̀ ɓi ki rèn.
Lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ Bàɓtis à yùghà, à ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ ɗi bìrɛs, kɛ̀ɛ ki nɔ mɛrɔ̀g, mìni lɛ, à rì rì kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay.
Man à mum à yùy, à kìkì lɛ, à ɗiɗì, à nɔnɔ̀, mìni lɛ: À rì ǹɗii com, à ki ɓa ti kinɔɔ̀ mɛ̀rɔ̀g, nyi tì rìghan ɗi ɓɛterì-làmpoŋ̀ rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe.
Kìɓan kifog ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi mɛ ghɛnɛn lɛ ɗi ri lɛ saaɗ a ɓɔn ɓii.
Fàrìzyɛŋ adɛŋ yɛɛ reŋìghà Yeesus lɛ a kɛǹ kìɗiì a mɛɛ mii, fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa ì ŋwaànɛ̀n à kɔ̀rì ɓi ɓìɗilàg.
Nni ǹkìì-kìɓe a giɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi bàn ìnɛn à wokày lɛ, Yeesus à rì ɓi ɓyom ɓi ɗiyɛn a mɛɛ mɛ Fàrìzyɛŋ ànɛ̀n; fɔɔnnɛ à yughày rì ɓeŋ à tìrààre ǹɗonɛn lɛ pisa,
à rɛlì Yeesus ajɛ̀m fɛlɛ̀ a mɛ̀kòò mii, à rènɗèn lèg ànɛ lɛ misì mii mɛ ɓwaŋzìghà mɛ̀kòò mɛ Yeesus. Fɔɔnnɛ à tɔ̀sìghà mɔ rì tyòŋ tii, à lɛ̀ŋlɛ̀ŋ mɔ à ki sisiŋi mɔ tìrààre.
Yɛ̀ɛ Fàrìzyɛŋ ànɛ à reŋìghà Yeesus à ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, à fèg ɓi ǹɗem wii lɛ: I Yeesus àa rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, di à rì lɛ, a yi lɛ, giɓ anɛ a kòmkom nyi ànɛ̀n, à rì kìɓeɓtàg ki giɓ.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ: Simɔn, ǹɗì rì kìɓan ki lɛ ǹkpaa wɔ̀, roànɛn à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Nɗèsàg tòòghrɛn!
Ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ tɔtɔ̀kà ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ̀pon, roànɛ, ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛtaǹ, roàmbog, dolà ǹtɛ̀ɗ.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi ri bee i ǹlèɓɛn nyi ɓɛ̀pon ɓɛǹ, nni à cenɛ̀ngà ɓɔ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. Nni ɓi ɓumɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛǹ, roàbe yɛɛ ri lɛ à keesì ɓà ŋwaànɛ̀n à cee roàmbog?
Simɔn à ɓàg Yeesus lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹghɛɛ lɛ, roànɛ ɓɛ cenɛ̀ngà ɓyoo mɔ̀ɔ̀ni. Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù kpaa saaɗ.

Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ giɓ anɛ̀n, à ki kpaa ti Simɔn lɛ: Ù ghɛɛ giɓ anɛ? Màa yùu a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, kɔɔ̀ fa mɛ mɛ̀nig mɛ lɛ nsoò mɛ̀kòò miì; wɔ̀lɛ nyii soo mɛ̀ mɛ̀kòò rì misì mii, à ki tɔ̀si mɔ rì tyòŋ tii.
Yɛ̀ɛ maà kpaŋi a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, wàa lɔ̀ri ɓi mɛ, kìɓan kifog, giɓ anɛ à fɔli ɓi loo mɛ̀ rìlɔ̀ɛ̀ɗ ɗi mɛkòò.
Wɔ̀ wàa siŋii ɓi mɛ mɔ̀ɔ ɓi ǹto, wɔ̀lɛ nyii siŋii mɛ̀ tìrààre ɓi mɛ̀kòò.
Giɓ anɛ à rèsii coo geesɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey ɓisuulɛ, gɛ ɓìɓe wiì à tì ǹcenɛn; kìɓan kìfog ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ cenɛɛ lɛsàg, à ti a rèsàg girig geesɛ̀n lɛsàg.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà min giɓ anɛ̀n lɛ: Ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓìcenɛn.
Nni ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà ǹɗaŋ ri nyi ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìfèg ɓi mɛ̀rem maa lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi mum aɗi ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ, ɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ ceecenɛ̀n ɓum lɛ rì ɓìɓe miì?
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà giɓ anɛ̀n lɛ: Rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗi ghɛɓsii wɔ̀, kɛ̀na lɛ fyòoog.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà lɛ rì ɓi bàn rì ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ, di a làalamɓɛ̀n à kakàlì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll. A ɓaghà ǹɗaŋ lɛ rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀,
rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ à nàɓkà ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɓɔ, à ki wɔ̀ɔ̀zi ɓɔ tìroɓ tidɛŋ; ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ: Rì Marii Madelɛn ànɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi kpagà ɓi nyoo taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀,
rì Zyaanɛ à gili Cuza ànɛ à ɓaghà m̀ɓèŋì-ìkum wu Eroodɛ, rì Soosana, rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛdɛŋ tì lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛghɛ̀ɓsìghà ɓɔ rì ìkum waa.
Nni coo gwìy ì ɓum ì taŋzɛ̀ngà; ɓum ɓɛ pɛsàg yì bàn lɛ bàn lɛ ɓɛɛ yu Yeesus a nyoo; fɔɔnnɛ à tekà min ɓɔ dàɗkì ìnɛ:
Ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ kɛ̀ngà kì mìsi boo ì ɓyom yìì nni yɛ̀ɛ à mìmìskà, boo ìdɛŋ ì kɛ̀n kì kpìi ɓi bee aɗyoo, ɓɛ̀ghaàgh-bee ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀dàg yɔ̀, tììlì ti ki ɗi yɔ̀ bimiɗ.
Gàɓ ìdɛŋ ì kpì ɓi gɔ̀g; yɛ̀ɛ ì ròòghà, ì womdàg ɓisuulɛ zi i ɓaghà kìgbag.
Fɔɔnnɛ gàɓ ìmbog ì kɛ̀ngà kì kpìi ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìkàrag, ɓi roòsɛ̀n nɗaŋ ri boo ìnɛ̀n ɓi laatàg yɔ̀.

Gàɓ ìmbog ì kpìghà ɓi syeesyee à zi, yɛ̀ɛ ì ròòghà, ì wumgì lɛ ǹɗyèm wufog, ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ. Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kalìghà ɓɔ jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè, mɛ lɛ à wog, à wog.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓe Yeesus ɓɛ tɔkà nyi kìɓan ki dàɗkì ìnɛn ì rèsii.

Nni Yeesus à ɓakà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi ɓɛg wìn, Bɛ̀ll à mɛ rèsi mini ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii, ɓi ɓi ɓaghà di ɓi kaka a rìnyam, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓum ɓɛmbog, ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ dàɗkì lɛ di ɓɛɛ ɓa lɛ, ɓaa soo seesèè, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn, ɓaa soo ki wowòg, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi.
Azi anɛ ɓi dàɗkì ìnɛn àrì lɛ: Boo ì ɓyom yɛ̀ɛ rì ɓi sìg à jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi tim̀ à bee, ɓɔ yɛɛ rilàg lɛ, i ɓaa wog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, Satàn a yùy ɓɔ yɔ̀ ki pisii ɓi mɛ̀rem lɛ ɓɛɛ rɔɓ kɛ̀ ɓɛɛ̀ gherɛn, ɓɛ ki mɛ̀n cɛɓ.

Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi tìcɔg ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti i ɓɛ woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ghaɓ yɔ̀ rì kìnyàà kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ càɗ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓag gàŋ ɓi mɛ̀rem maa; i mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛ kpaŋi a lɔ̀ŋkaa, ɓɛ naŋ rìgherɛ̀n.

Boo ìnɛ ì kpìghà ɓi ɓìkàrag ì rèsii ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ rilàg lɛ, i ɓɛ woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, ɓyom ɓi lɛ, rì cɛɛ̀-ǹɗem ànɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi zɛy rì zɛy, rì rìyɛ̀y ɗi zi, ɓi duŋzì rìgherɛ̀n ɗyaa, ɗi rɔɓ bee ri bee, ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wum ɓidùn ɓi lɛ ɓɛ kɔs.

Boo ìnɛ ì kpìghà ɓi zi i m̀fɔmɛn yɛ̀ɛ ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ wokì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll syeesyee à rìwog, ri mɛ̀rem mɛ syeesyee mɛ mɛ ki rì mɛ̀tɛnɛn, ɓɛ ɓeŋ̀ yɔ̀, ɓɛ ki wum ɓiɗùn lɛ kìsììrì kaa.

Ŋwaà yin lɛ à ròòsì lamɓà lɛ a sigtɛn nyi rì kìbɔkɔ̀, nsoò lɛ a rɛsi nyi a ɓyomɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓii zi; com ki à rì lɛ à kì ki ri lɛ, a saagh nyi ɓi com aɗyòò, lɛ i mum à ɗiŋii yì ɓi naa, à ghɛnɛ̀n.
Kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan kìdɛŋ ki a rìnyam ki ki ri ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi lɛ ki yilɛɛ ɓì; nsoò dwìɗ idɛŋ yàa rɔ̀ɓ ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀ kì kpagii dan.

Ɓì konàg lɔŋ ri riwog ɗi ɓì ti ɓì wokì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll; ɓisuulɛ, ŋwaànɛ à rì rì com innɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì fatii, wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ kɔ ɓɛ ɓatɛ̀n nsoò maa gàɓ ànɛ nyiì fèfeg lɛ à rì rì nyi.
Jɛɛ rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ yughày lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ nyi wɔ̀lɛ, ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓì lɛ ɓɛ kpaŋ nyi jàŋbog lɛ gwìy ì ceeghà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Gaa rì ɓɛ̀goni ɓɛ ri fɛnii ɓi dan, ɓɛɛ̀ ki kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛǹ wɔ̀.
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Jɛɛ wɛ̀m rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ wokì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ki kì yɛ̀ɛ ì kpaa.
Ŋwos adɛŋ, Yeesus à ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔm rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ti syàana cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ syaà.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɛnkɛni ɓi kìkɔm, fìlo fi teɗ Yeesus; nni coo bɛ̀ɓ ì tumɛ̀ngà rìfɛɓsì ɓi rìɓày lɛɛ̀gwey, lèg ànɛ lɛ kìkɔm ki ɓaghà lɛ ki ɓim, ɓɔɔ ki cùù.

Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀ngà Yeesus a nyoo, ɓɛ tum nyi rìghèmzì di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, ǹɗèsàg, ti cuu yɛɛ lɛ̀. Nni à ghèmbɛ̀ngà, à fwààdɛ̀n lɛ rì bɛ̀ɓ, rì ɓìkus ɓi riɓày, ɓyom ɓìn ɓi maarɛ̀n lɛ tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, jàŋ i sugtì lɛ fyòoog.

Nni Yeesus à tɔkà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Righerɛ̀n ɗin ɗyɛɛ̀ mbe? Yɛ̀ɛ ìris wu ɓangà ɓɔ, nni ɓɛ kuuràkà, ɓɛ ki tɔɔtɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi mum aɗi ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ, ɗi ɗi tɔkì bɛ̀ɓ, rì mɛ̀nig com ki ɓyɛɛ ki ɓyɔɔ ki kì nyi mɛ̀wog?
Nni ɓɛ kpagà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓumɓɛ a Geraza, ki ki ɓaghày lɛ kɔ cɛcɛɗ, Galile cɛcɛɗ.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à sɛngày kìkɔm, nni ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ɓi bàn ìnɛn, à yughà kì tuusɛɛ rì nyi. Ki ɓaghà di kaa finɛn yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à rɔ̀ɓkà kìtòn zɛy lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, kɛ̀ɛ laati ɓi naa, à lalày lɔŋ ɓi dɛm i zɔ̀ŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghɛngà Yeesus, à kpì nyi a mɛ̀kòò, à syan jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò lɛ: Yeesus, Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg, ki ri wɔ̀ la ri mɛ̀? M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh wɔ̀, kɔɔ yeesi ɓaà mɛ.

À kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ, Yeesus à kàŋkàŋgà kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay lɛ, kɛɛ kpaŋ ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n. Kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay kìn ki yeèyèèsìghà ŋwàanɛ̀n ɓyààmɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey; ɓi ɗi lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɛŋ̀ nyi kɛ̀ɛ dèŋdeŋ, ɓɛ ǹkàgàg nyi ɓɛn ɗì mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi mɛ bɔŋ lɛ, rì ɓyàg rì mɛ̀kòò, kìɓan kifog, àa nti à pwagì bɛn yiǹ, kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn ki tini nyi lɛ a kɛǹ kì dèŋdeŋi ɓi mɛ̀reɓ.
Nni Yeesus à tɔkà nyi lɛ: Ù rì ɗii lɛ ghɛn? Ŋwaànɛ̀n à bàg nyi lɛ: Ǹɗì ɗii lɛ: Ɓìtuu, ɓisuulɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɓaghà nyi bi nyoo ɓìtuu lɛ ɓìtuu.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓìn ɓi ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzìghà Yeesus lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ rom ɓyɔ lɛ ɓyɛ̀ kɛǹ ɓi rìɓee ɗi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghày.

Coo kituu ki jèè ki ɓaghà wɔɔ jàŋbog, ki ɗiɗi ɓyaaɓi ɓi dòn aɗyòò. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɓɔŋzàkà Yeesus lɛ, a caɗ ɓyɔ, ɓyɛɛ kɛǹ kì ɗiŋii ɓi kìtuu ki jèè kiǹ, nni Yeesus à gherɛ̀ngà.
Ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi kpaŋ min ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n, ɓi ɗiŋì ɓi kìtuu ki jèè. Fɔɔnnɛ jèè yi kɛɛ̀ghrɛ̀ngày ɓi dòn aɗyòò, yi suùrɛ̀n ɓi rìɓày, yi cuu mɛnig.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì-jèè ɓɛ ghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ, nni ɓɛ ghɛŋìghà, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì sààtii ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n ɓi bàn, rì ɓi jɛ̀m i ɓilɔ̀ŋ.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ pɛsàkày lɛ ɓɛ yuù kìghɛɛ̀ kìɓan ki ki kilɛ̀ngà kiǹ; ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà ŋwaànɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi pɛsɛ̀ngà ɓi nyoo ànɛ̀n di à kɔ̀kɔrii Yeesus a mɛ̀kòò, nyi rì ɓìlàà ɓi nyoo, à ki ɓa ɓi nyimiɗ, nni ɓɛ risìghà.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ kìcèm, ɓɛ kpaaghà ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ yuyùghày ɓɛǹ, yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wɔ̀ɔ̀zìghà ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay.
Nni ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki lɛ Geraza ɓɛ kpaaghà Yeesus lɛ a pɛsɛn ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kaa, a ghaagh fìràɓ, ɓisuulɛ ìris wu ɓangà ɓɔ lɛɛ̀gwey. Nni Yeesus à ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔm, à sugtì a Galile.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi kpagà ɓi nyoo ànɛ̀n à ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà Yeesus lɛ, nyii nɔɔ̀ti ànɛ̀n, wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ɓèèdɛ̀ng, à kpaa ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ:
Sugha a mɛɛ mɔɔ, u kpaa ɓum ɓɔɔ com ki Bɛ̀ll àa kìi wɔ̀; fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à sukà min, à lààlàmɓɛ̀n com ki Yeesus à kìghà nyi bàn bimiɗ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à sukày rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗi à ɓaghày cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày, nni gwìy ì ɓum ì ghàɓkà nyi, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓoŋɓòŋgà nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Zyayirus, ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹlàmì ànɛ ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, à yughày Yeesus a nyoo, à kpì nyi a mɛ̀kòò, à ɓɔ̀ŋzì nyi lɛ a yu a mɛɛ mii,
ɓisuulɛ, à ɓaghà lɔŋ maa man bog, àncèm giɓ, di à ti bèg ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì yiɓɛɛ̀; nni man ancèm à kɔ̀ɔ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀sìghà. Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà wɔɔ, gwìy ì sììsììrìghà nyi lɛɛ̀gwey.

Nni giɓ adɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ, bwaɓ yi kpaŋkpàŋ nyi, di à ti ɓi fìroɓ fìn bèg ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì yiɓɛɛ̀; à ɓaghà di à mɛ yogsi ɓɔɔ ɓyom ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm a ɓɛ̀ɗɔgtà, nsoò kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ, ki wɔɔ̀zìghà ɓì nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à cègày Yeesus ajɛ̀m, à kòm rìkeɓ ɗii ɗi kilàà, bwaɓ yi yi kpaŋkpàŋgà nyi yi ghas kì renɛɛ lɔŋ wɔɔ foo.
Nni Yeesus à tɔkà lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ komi mɛ̀ lɔɔ? Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ ti ɓiì rooroòzɛ̀n, nni Pyɛɛri à ɓakà nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, ɓum ɓɛɛ ceŋzɛɛ wɔ̀ lɛ, ɓɛ ki sìisiìrì wɔ̀.
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Mum à kòmi mɛ̀, ɓisuulɛ, ǹwoogh yɛ̀ɛ ìtèɗ wudɛŋ wu kpaŋiì mɛ̀ ɓi nyòò.

Yɛ̀ɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à ghɛngà lɛ, kìɓan ki àa kìi ki yiìdi a rìnyam, nni à yùghà kì kpìi Yeesus a mɛ̀kòò di a nìighniŋdɛ̀n, à kpaa nyi ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓisuucɛ nnɛ àa kòmi nyi, rì yɛ̀ɛ àa ghàsi kì wɔ̀ni lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ àa kòmi nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà min nyi lɛ: Gɔ̀n yɛ̀m! rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗi ghɛɓsii wɔ̀, kɛ̀na lɛ fyòoog!
Yeesus à kaka à kpaakpàà giɓ anɛ̀n fɔlɔɔ, nni mum à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a mɛɛ mɛ nlàmì ànɛ ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛn, à yù kì kpaa lɛ: Zyayirus, gɔ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀ i ti kìloŋ, kɔ̀ɔ yeesi ti ǹɗèsàg zɛy.
Kìɓan kifog, Yeesus à wokà kìɓan ki ŋwaànɛ̀n à kpaaghà, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà Zyayirus lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ risi! Lɔŋ ǹtyweeyi wɛɛ̀wu ɓaya rì wɔ, di gɔ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì cɛɓ.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà a mɛɛ mɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à gherɛ̀ngà ɓì lɛ, ɓum ɓɛɛ ɗiŋi ɓi naa ǹɗaŋ ri nyi, i ki cee ɓi lɛ, rì Pyɛɛri rì Zyaŋ rì Zyag, rì ɓɛ̀yalì man ànɛ̀n, ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ à càɗkà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗiŋì.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ rɔŋɗɔ̀ŋgà ɓìkiŋ di ɓɛɛ̀ sàasarɛ̀n rì ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn ɓisuu man ànɛ̀n. Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà min ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi rènɗen, a wii ɓi, à rì ɓi fìlo.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ fengàkà nyi, lɛ ɓɛ yighà saaɗ lɛ mutyàà rì kìloŋ.
Kìɓan kifog Yeesus à ɓangà man ànɛ̀n ɓi càg, à kpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò lɛ: Mutyàànɛ pɛ̀sɛn aɗyòò.
Nghay wu ŋwɔɓti wu sugtìì, à ghàs kì pɛ̀sɛɛ aɗyòò, Yeesus à tɔg min lɛ ɓɛɛ fa nyi ɓìɗilàg.
Ɓɛ̀yalì man ànɛ̀n ɓɛ kuuràkà lɛɛ̀gwey, wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à siitàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaa mum kìɓan ki ki kilɛ̀ngà kiǹ.
Nni Yeesus à taŋzɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à fa ɓɔ itèɗ wu nàɓɛn ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm, rì wulɛ ɓɛɛ wɔɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓɛ̀roroɓ.
Fɔɔnnɛ à romgà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ ki làalam̀ɓɛ̀n Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ki wɔ̀ɔwɔɔ̀zì ɓɛ̀roroɓ.
Nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi ɓanɛn com yɛ̀ɛ ɓi kɛ̀nkɛ̀n, kɛ̀ ɓi teɗ nsoò kìgeŋ, nsoò ɓàm, nsoò com kiɗiyɛn, nsoò mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nsoò ɓìlàà ɓiɓɛɛ̀.
Naa bimiɗ ìnɛ ɓɛ ghaɓi mìni wɔɔ, kɔ̀riina ɓi naa ìnɛ̀n, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓi rì wɔɔ ɓiì pɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓi ghaàgh.
Jàŋ bimiɗ ìnɛ ɓɛ beni mìni kì ghàɓi, kùrina kùrùɓu ànɛ mìni ɓi mɛ̀kòò di ɓì ti ɓiì pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi bàn ìncèm, rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛ resi zɛ̀ɗ yaà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛǹ ɓɛ kɛngà, ɓɛ rereni ɓìlɔ̀ŋ di ɓɛɛ̀ kakali ɓum Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, ɓɛ wɔɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓum jàŋbimiɗ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Eroodɛ à wokà gɛ ɓìɓan bimiɗ ànɛ Yeesus à kìkìghà ànɛn, ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ɗim nyi, ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ: Zyaŋ ànɛ̀n yɛɛ ghem̀ɓɛɛ yì a nyɔ̀ɛ̀y.
Ɓum ɓɛmbog lɛ Eli ànɛn yɛ̀ɛ resɛɛ tì; ɓɛdɛŋ tì lɛ, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ abɛ̀y kɛɛ ghemɓɛɛ yì a nyɔ̀ɛ̀y.

Fɔɔnnɛ Eroodɛ à tɔɔ̀ghtɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà rì ǹɗem lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛmiɗ yɛɛ kpaaghà lɛ, ɓɛɛ ren ǹto wu Zyaŋ; nni roànɛ rìkem ɗyɛɛ̀ pàpas mɛ ànɛ, nyi ri ɓà ghɛn? Fɔɔnnɛ à kaakààghà bee inɛ lɛ a ghɛǹ Yeesus.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus à romgà ɓɛ sugtìghày, ɓɛ kpaa nyi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ kighày, fɔɔnnɛ à syògà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kìpàs ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Bɛdsayida.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi wokà jàŋ inɛ à ɓaghà, nni ɓi nɔɔtàkà nyi wɔɔ, Yeesus à ghàɓ ɓɔ lɛ syeesyee, à kpaakpaa ɓɔ ɓɔlɛ̀ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, à ki wɔ̀ɔwɔɔ̀zì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì rìkɛŋ ɓi nyòò.

Di ŋwos a ti ɓiì kɛ̀nkɛni, nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ tyɛɛ̀tɛ̀ngày, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Kali gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ kɛǹ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ rì ɓi jɛ̀m yi ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓi ri fɛ jàŋbog, ɓɛɛ kaà fìlo, rì com ki ɓɛ rì lɛ ɓɛ ɗi, ɓisuulɛ jàŋ inɛ tì rì ìnɛ ì rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ com.

Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Mìniìɓɔmiɗ, faana ɓɔ ɓìɗilàg; wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛǹ ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Tì rì lɔŋ fɛ lɛ bìrɛs yitaǹ, rì ɓìzɛn ɓìɓɛɛ̀; tì rì lɛ tì lam ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ̀cèm di tì ɓa tii yì nya kìlaàgh ɓiɗilàg ɓidɛŋ ɓisu wàà.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà nunùg ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛtaǹ. Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ̀siina ɓɔ ɓì gwìy ɓi gwìy; gwìy bog ɓum mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kìghà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà, ɓɛ kɔɔ̀sì ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi zi.

Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à tekà bìrɛs yi kitaǹ yiǹ, rì ɓìzɛn ɓi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀, à ɓegsì mis aɗyòò, à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à ɓɛkì bìrɛs, à syòngì ɓìzɛn, à fa min ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, lɛ ɓɛɛ kaɓsi gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɗìghà, ɓɛ wuràg ɓɛ ki taŋzɛn ɓìɓɛghà ɓi ɓi rɔ̀ɓtàkà ɓi ron ɓìkàɗ ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓiɓɛɛ̀.
Ŋwos adɛŋ, di Yeesus a kìki bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n kìpàs nɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii nni à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Gɛ ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ànɛ a fèki ɓaà lɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ghɛn?
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ kpaaghi lɛ, ù rì Zyaŋ Bàɓtis, ɓɛmbog lɛ, wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri Eli, ɓɛmbog tì lɛ, ù rì kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓiɓan ɓɛ abɛ̀y, ki ki ghemɓɛɛ yì a nyɔ̀ɛ̀y.
Nni à tɔgtìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi kpaaghi lɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ghɛn? Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ù rì Kiris ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à romiì.
Yeesus à siitɛ̀n ɓɔ, à sììràg ɓɔ kì kpaà lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaa ɓum lɛ nyii ri Kiris.

Nni à ɓɔ̀ɓtìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ Man à mum a wog rìkɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey; ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey, rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ rì nyi ɓiì roòzɛɛ, ɓɛ ki wey nyi; kìɓan kifog à ghèmɓɛ̀n ɓi ŋwos a kìraa.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ ki kɔni lɛ a nɔɔ̀ti mɛ̀, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì roòzɛɛ nyimiɗ, à ki tɛ̀g kɔrɔs wìì ŋwos anɛ aɗyòò bimiɗ, fɔɔnnɛ à nɔ̀ɔ̀tì min mɛ,
ɓisuulɛ, mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì ɓiì kɔ̀ni lɛ a kamɛn rì cɛɓ kii à rì kɔ ɓiì ɗimzii, ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì ɗimzii cɛɓ kii lɛ mɛ̀, nnyɛ̀ɛ ri kɔ ɓiì ghɛɓsii.
Ki ghɛɓsii mum cɛ lɛ a fɔ̀n ziinɛ bimiɗ di à ɗimzii cɛɓ kìì?

Ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì mɛ̀ ɓiì woògh ǹtoòrìɗ, nsoò lɛ à wog ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀ ǹtoòrìɗ, Man à mum à woogh gɛ nyi girig ǹtoòrìɗ yɛ̀ɛ à yùugɛy ɓi rìkem ɗii, rì ɗì Seŋì, rì ɗi ɓumɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn.
Ǹkalii mìni saaɗ à rìkpàà lɛ, kìgwey ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ rɛrɛlii ɓɛ, kaa cuu ɓi di ki ka ghɛn ɓi kilɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, mɛ̀ru mɛ ghaghìghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ taàraa; fɔɔnnɛ à tekà lɛ, rì Pyɛɛri, rì Zyaŋ rì Zyag ɓɛ ɓɔg ɓi dòn aɗyòò lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔŋzi Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kìkìghà bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ìsu wii wu koɓsɛ̀n, ɓìlàà ɓii ɓi sug ɓì puɓ lɛ syaŋ̀syaŋ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sigmɛ̀ngà di à ti ɓiì tòtoogh ri ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ rì Moyis rì Eli.
Ɓɔ yɛɛ resɛ̀ngày rì coo rigwey, ɓɛ kpaakpàà kìɓan ki risug ɗi Yeesus ɗi ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì kìlɛɛ a Yorisalɛm.
Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri rì ɓɛ̀reŋkàŋ ɓii ɓɛ cuughà tìlo; yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghemɓɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ ghɛn rìgwey ɗì Yeesus, rì ɓum ɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ à ɓaghà rì ɓɔ ɓɛ̀n.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ti lɛ ɓɛɛ ghasɛn rì Yeesus, nni Pyɛɛri à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg! ki rì kìrɔɔ di tì rɔ̀ɓi fɛ, tì toŋ ɓìlaa ɓiraa, kìfog ɓisuu wɔɔ, kìfog ɓisuu Moyis, kìfog ɓisuu Eli. À yighà gì ɓì com ki à kpaakpààghà.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni kìkwìɗ ki yughà, ki riɓì ɓɔ, ìris wu ɓan ɓɛyilàg di ki ti ɓɔ ɓiì rìɓii.
Fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓaghày ɓi kìkwìɗ lɛ: Roànɛ, à rì Man wɛm̀ ànɛ ǹɗɔ̀tɛ̀ngà, wooghna nyì.
Yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì tòòghrɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ sigmɛ̀n lɛ Yeesus à mɛ rɔ̀ɓ cɛ̀ncii. Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ nyamgà kìɓan ki ɓɛ ghɛngà kiǹ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓùŋ mum kɔ.
Ɓi duri tana, yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ sɛngày dòn, coo gwìy ì ɓum ì yughà kì ɓoŋì Yeesus.
Nni ɓi nyìinyìm à gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n, ŋwaàdɛŋ à syangà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg! kùrùg m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh wɔ̀, pɛɓsɛn ɓà mɛ ŋwɔɓti wɛ̀m ànɛ, ɓisuulɛ nnyɛɛ ri lɔŋ maa m̀bobog wɛ̀m à man.

Kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kidɛŋ ki ti lɛ, i ki sɛni ɓi nyi, à tumɛ̀n rìsyan a kɔ̀ɔ̀ à kìkì lɛ zaɗ zaɗ, di a fuufuùsì tìtyɛɛ; ki ti ki ɓalàg kìtètèɗ ki kiɓan lɛ kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay kìn kɛɛ caɗ nyi, ki mɛ fɔɔsi nyi lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.
Mɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ naɓ kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay kìn, nni ki n-yaagh ɓɔ rìnàɓ.
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ ɓì rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n, ɓì ki ɓa ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum ɓɛ! Ǹɗì ɓiì kɔ̀rii ti rì mìni ǹki nìniɗ ǹɗem rì ɓìɓan ɓin à kpaŋ fin? Yuiy fɛ rì man wɔɔ̀.

Yɛ̀ɛ mutyàànɛn à tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus, kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay ki sɛn ɓi nyi, ki roŋ ɓi zi, à tumɛ̀n rì kìkì lɛ zaɗ zaɗ; fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à fwààdɛ̀ngà kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay, à wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ŋwɔɓti, à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi rì seŋì.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛ kuuràkà rìgwey ɗi itèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛɛ̀ ka kuukuùghràg ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛ Yeesus à kìkìghà ɓɛǹ, nni à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ:
Ramina mɛ̀reè, ɓi wog kìɓan ki ǹ-yùu mìni kì kpaà ki. Ɓɛ ri ɓiì kàɓi Man à mum ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓum.
Kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ wokà ɓi azi anɛ ɓi rìkpaa ɗìn; ɗi rɔɓkà ɓɔ kìrìirìɓ lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi azi anɛ miì, ɓɔɔ ki rirìsìghà nyi rìtɔg ɗi azi anɛ ɓi kìɓan kiǹ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìnyoònyòlɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ yi ghɛn anɛ ɓi ɓɔ yɛɛ cee ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmɓòg.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yìghà com ki ɓɛ fefèkà ɓi mɛ̀rem maa, nni à tekà maa ŋwɔɓti, à rɛsì nyi ŋwɔŋì rì nyi,

à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à ghàɓi maa ŋwɔɓti ànɛ ɓi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, di mɛ̀ɛmiɗ innɛ à ghàɓi; fɔɔnnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ghàɓi mɛ̀ à ghàɓi girig roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀ ɓisuulɛ roànɛ à ɓiì ɓiisɛɛ ki ghɛnɛɛ lɛsàaag ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, nnyɛɛ cee mìniìcèm.
Nni Zyaŋ à tòòghrɛ̀ngà, à kpaa lɛ: Ǹɗesàg! tyàa ghɛɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ, di a nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɗii ɗyɔɔ, nni tyàa rèegh nyi, ɓisuulɛ à yingag ɓi nɗaŋ wis.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà Zyaŋ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi règ nyi, ɓisuulɛ, ŋwaànɛ à yin ɓiì ɗùùɗuu ri mìni, à rì ɓi gàm yìn.
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ru mɛ lɛ Yeesus a pɛsɛn ɓi ziinɛ mɛ ɓaghà dì mɛ ti jàŋbog, à rengà rì ǹɗem wii wucem lɛ, à kɛ̀ɛ a Yorisalɛm.
Fɔɔnnɛ à lokà kì romì ɓum beèbɛ̀y. Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ roŋì bee, ɓɛ kpaŋ ɓi maa kìlɔ̀ŋ àdɛŋ ànɛ a Samari lɛ ɓɛɛ pegsɛn ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi rìyù ɗii,
kìɓan kifog ɓɛ ghaɓkà ɓi nyi wɔɔ ɓisuulɛ à ɓaghà ɓiì kɛ̀nkɛ̀ni a Yorisalɛm.
Yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ rì Zyag ɓɛ ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Kan! tì yin lɛ tì tɔg lɛ ɗuu ɗyɛɛ sɛn yì aɗyoo ɗyɛɛ ɗigsi ɓumɓɛ?
Nni à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngày à nyɛɛdɛ̀n ɓɔ, à kpaa lɛ: Ɓì yii ɓi nya rìkuu ɗi ǹghay ɗi ɗi ri ɓi mìni.
Ɓisuulɛ, Man à mum à yùghà ɓi lɛ a ɗimzi ɓyɛɓ ɓi ɓum, à yùghà lɔŋ ɓyɔ kì ghɛɓsii. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà ɓi maa kìlɔ̀ŋ àdɛŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi bee, ŋwaàdɛŋ à kpaaghà Yeesus lɛ: Ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii jàŋbimiɗ ìnɛ ù kɛ̀ɛ.
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ɓìbina ɓi ri rì mɛ̀kuɓi, tììlì ti aɗyòò rì ɓìlaa, kìɓan kifog, Man à mum à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ jàŋ inɛ a fɔɔ̀sag wɔɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ŋwaàmbog lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀. Roànɛ̀n à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ka cenɛn mɛ̀, nka ɓas̀ kì ɓòmi seŋi wɛ̀m.
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Càra ɓìloŋ ɓyɛɛ ɓom̀ ɓìloŋ ɓyaa, kìɓan kifog wɔ̀ɔ̀ kɛ̀na kì kakalii ɓum ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
Nni ŋwaàdɛŋ à kpaatìghà nyi lɛ: Kan, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii, nni ka càra mɛ̀, ǹghesɛn yì naa yɛ̀m ì ɓum.
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ, i à ɓeegh kìɓan, à tumɛn kɔ, wɔ̀lɛ kɛ̀ɛ kì kɔ lɛ, a fèfeg ɓiɓan ɓidɛŋ ɓi nyi ajɛ̀m, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ri kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Kan à ɓɔ̀ɔ̀dìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛdɛŋ mɛ̀tin mɛraa rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ à log ɓɔ kì romì beèbɛ̀y ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓi bàn rì ɓi jàŋ yicèm yi nyimiɗ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà wɔɔ ki kɛ̀ɛ.
Nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀saŋ mɛ teghɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay lɛsàg; ɓɔ̀ŋzaaghna min ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀saŋ lɛ, a rom yì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ ɓɛɛ sàŋ nyi mɛ̀saŋ.
Kɛ̀ɛna, ǹɗomi mìni fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìmonɗo.
Kɛ̀ ɓi teɗ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nsoò ɓàm, nsoò gòò, kɛ̀ ɓì tògsi mum ɓi bee.
Mɛɛ mɛcèm mɛ ɓi ɗiŋii wɔɔ, kaliina ɓumɓɛ miì lɛ: Fyòoog à Bɛ̀ll a ɓa ɓi mɛɛ mɛ.
I ŋwaà fyòoog à rì ɓi mɛɛ mɛncèm fyòoog wìn a ɓiì kɔ̀rii a lɔ̀ŋkii. Wɔ̀lɛ i ŋwaà fyòoog à yin ɓi mɛɛ mɛǹ, fyòoog wìn a ɓiì sugtii yi mìni ɓi nyòò.
Kɔ̀riina lɔŋ ɓi mɛɛ mɛǹ, ɓi ɗiɗì ɓi ki nɔnɔ ɓyom ɓi ɓɛ faa mìni wɔɔ, ɓisuulɛ, ǹkìì-kìsay a ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà rì mɛ̀lèɓ; kɛ̀ ɓi dèŋdèŋ lɛ, ì ɓì rì ɓi naa ìnɛ, ɓì cee ɓi ìnɛ.
Bàn bimiɗ ìnɛ ɓì rì ɓiì ɗiŋii miì, i ɓɛ ghaɓi mìni lɛ syeesyee, ɓi ɗi com kìcèm ki ɓɛ ɓiì faà mìni wɔɔ.
Wɔ̀ɔ̀ziina ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn, ɓì kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki ti mìni jàŋbog.
Kìɓan kifog, bàn bimiɗ ìnɛ ɓì rì ɓiì ɗiŋii miì, ì ɓumɓɛ miì ɓɛ ghaɓi ɓi mini, kpaŋdɛɛna ɓi beègwey, ɓì kpaa lɛ:
Tì kùri kùrùɓu ànɛ ɓi bàn yìn ànɛ àa maɓkii ɓìsi ɓi mɛ̀kòò lɛ a ɓa fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ wusìnɛ̀ɗ wis. Kìɓan kifog yiina lɛ, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki ti mìni jàŋbog.
Ǹkalii mìni lɛ: ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓaa ɓiisɛn ɓi ki nyɛnì rì ɓumɓɛ a Sɔdɔm yɛ̀ɛ à ri nyɛn ri ɓumɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ̀n.

Nyìighnyìg rì wɔ̀ Korazɛŋ, nyìighnyìg rì wɔ̀ Bɛdsayida, lɛ i dàm yi ɓiɓan yi yi mɛ kìlɛn yi fɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin yɛɛ kilɛn fɔlɔɔ a Tiir, rì a Sidɔŋ, di ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà mɛ̀rem fìɗyàɓ, ɓɛ waatàg mɛ̀kùtì, ɓɛ ki siŋɗɛn kiɓu, lɛ ɓɛɛ resi ɓum bim ìnɛ ɓɛ woogh ɓisuu ɓiɓe ɓyaa.
Nni yiina lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à ri nyɛn ri mìni a cee rìnyɛn ɗi à ri nyɛn ri Tiir nsoò lɛ rì Sidɔŋ ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m.
Nni wɔ̀ Kapɛrinawum, u fèfeg nya lɛ, ù ɓiì ɓɔɔgh ù kpaŋ aɗyoo? Èe èe ù ɓiì sɛnì, ù kpaŋ a nyɔ̀ɛ̀y.
I mum à woogh mìni, di mɛ̀ nnɛ à woogh; ŋwaànɛ à ɓeni mìni di à ɓèni mɛ̀; wɔ̀lɛ i mum à ɓèni mɛ̀ di, à ɓèni girig roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg mɛ̀tin mɛraa rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ sugtighày rì kìnyàà, ɓɛ kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Kan, nsoò ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓyɛɛ ririsi ɓisi di tì fwààdɛɛ ɓyɔ ɓi ɗii ɗyɔ̀ɔ̀.
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹghɛngà di Satàn a kɔ̀sɛɛ yì aɗyòò, à kpì fɛlɛ yɛɛ̀ ŋwàaŋwàɗ.
Ghɛɛna lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ nfaa mìni ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓi kɛɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi nyoo, rì ɓi tìrèè, ɓi ki dùŋzag ìteɗ wu bènàbena ànɛ lɛ Satàn wùcèm; fɔɔnnɛ com kaa kì ɓi wààdɛŋ.
Kìɓan kifog, kɛ̀ ɓi ɓiisɛn ki nyàànyaa lɛ, ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓyɛɛ̀ ririsi mini, nyàànyaana lɔŋ lɛ mii min mɛ ti mɛ̀ kànɛn ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm.

Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki kìghà lɛ Yeesus a wog kìrɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, à ki kpaa lɛ: Tààta, wàànɛ ù làmii lɛ, rì ɗyoo rì zi, ǹfaa wɔ̀ ɓìtògsɛ̀n lɛ ù nyamgàkà ɓɛ̀yiì-ɓìɓan, rì ɓum ɓɛ ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓìɓan ɓi; rì tì lɛ, ù kìghà lɛ ɓyɛɛ yilɛn a ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg. Ɛ̀ɛ̀ Tààta, ǹtògsaagh yɛ̀ɛ ki nɗɔɔ wɔ̀ lɛ kɛɛ kilɛn fɔlɔɔ.
Seŋi wɛ̀m à faghà mɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à yii ɓi ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ ri lɛ Man i ki yin lɛ Tààta rì ghɛn yɛɛ ri lɛ Tààta, i ki cee ɓi lɛ Man, rì roànɛ Man à rèsii Tààta.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à nìmɓɛ̀ngà a ɓɛ̀yilàg, à kɔ̀ŋɗɛ̀n ɓɔ lɛ: Mààgh rì mìni lɛ, ɓi seesee ɓiɓan ɓi.

Ɓisuulɛ kigwey ki ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, rì mɛ̀fòm, ɓɛ ɓaghà rì zày ìnɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ ɓìɓan ɓi mìnii seesee ɓi, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓi ɓyɔ; ɓɔ tì rì zày ìnɛ lɛ, ɓɛɛ wog ɓìɓan ɓi mìnii wowog ɓi wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓi ɓyɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìtèetèɗ ki ǹɗèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ki pɛsɛngày lɛ, kɛɛ feèghrɛn Yeesus, ki tɔg nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi ɓi ɗi lɛ m̀ɓa rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀?
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ ri kì kànɛn ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll, ù ti ù ɓààyì la miì?

Ŋwaànɛn à ɓàg Yeesus lɛ: Ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì keesii Kan Bɛ̀ll wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì ǹɗem wɔɔ wucèm, rì ǹghay wɔɔ kicèm, rì ìtèɗ wɔɔ wucèm, rì mɛ̀yitì mɔɔ mɛcèm, ù ki keesi ti romum ànɛ à wuɓsɛɛ wɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ wɛ̀ɛmiɗ.
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ù konaagh kì ɓàagh; nni kìya fɔlɔɔ, di u ɓa rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Kìɓan kìfog yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ, a resi lɛ à rì saaɗ à mum, nni à tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ rì romum ànɛ à wuɓsɛɛ mɛ̀?
Yeesus à ɓàg tì nyi lɛ: Ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà a Yorisalɛm lɛ à kɛ̀ɛ a Zyeriko, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀zyaàzyaa ɓɛ ɓangà nyi, ɓɛ ɓatàg ɓyom ɓii, ɓɛ ki ɓog nyi, ɓɛ càɗ nyi ǹɗèè rì nyɔ̀ɛ̀y.
Ŋwos anɛ̀n, pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àdɛŋ à ròŋighà girig bee yɔ̀miɗ inɛ̀n, nni yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ̀zyaàzyaa ɓɛ kulà ànɛ̀n à kɔŋ bee ɓɛg àmbog.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi boo ì mum ì Levi à kpaagà girig ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n à ghɛn ŋwaànɛ̀n, à ghaàgh girig lɛ reeeɓ, kɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀ŋmɛn.
Kìɓan kìfog, muu Samari àdɛŋ à kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà rìkɛ̀ɛ̀, nni à yùghà kì kpaŋì ŋwaànɛ à nɔ̀nɔ̀ŋìghà ànɛ̀n jàŋbog, nyìighnyìg ì kì nyi rì ŋwaànɛ̀n.

Fɔɔnnɛ à tyoŋdɛ̀ngà nyi a nyoo, à foŋ lɛ, rì mɔɔ rì mɛ̀rɔ̀g ɓi beŋ, à ki kàŋ yɔ, à pɛ̀sì min nyi, à kɔ̀ɔ̀sì nyi ɓi jàɗki yiì aɗyòò, à kɛ̀n ɗì nyi a mɛɛ mɛ ɓɛ̀kèn ɓɛɛ̀ laayi miì à kì nyi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi kɔɔ̀kɔ̀nɛ̀ngà lɛ a ki nyi.

Ɓi duri tana nni muu Samari ànɛ̀n à sɔ̀ŋìghà tìraŋ̀ ti mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à fa mɔ rì ŋwaànɛ à kɔ̀mɛ̀ngà naa ì ɓɛ̀kèn inɛ̀n, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Rɔ̀ɓa mɛ̀ kì ɓèŋɓeŋi ŋwaànɛ, i ki kpaŋi lɛ ù sagtɛɛ tì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛdɛŋ aɗyòò ɓi mɛ ǹcàri mɛ ɓi rìɓèŋ ɗi ù rì nyi ɓiì ɓèŋɓeŋi, ǹlèɓ wɔ̀ mɔ di ǹti ɓiì suùgh.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à tɔkà min ǹɗèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ànɛ ɓɛ totòkà ànɛ̀n ɓɛɛ nyi lɛ: Ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kiraa ɓɛ̀n, roàbe nnɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ ghɛɛ lɛ, à ɓiisɛɛ ki wuɓsɛɛ ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ̀zyaàzyaa ɓɛ kulà ànɛ̀n?
Roànɛ̀n à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹghɛɛ lɛ, muu Samari ànɛ à wokà ŋwaànɛ̀n nyìighnyìg yɛ̀ɛ wuɓsɛɛ nyi. Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà min ǹɗèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna anɛ̀n lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ kɛ̀na u kilag girig fɔlɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi bee, nni Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kidɛŋ, fɔɔnnɛ giɓ adɛŋ ɗii lɛ Maata, à ghàɓkà nyi a mɛɛ mii.
Giɓ anɛ̀n à ɓaghà rì geni a giɓ ɗii lɛ Marii, nnyɛɛ kɔ̀righà Kan a mɛ̀kòò, à wowòg ɓìtòkì ɓii.

Maata nyii ɓaghà ǹɗem rì gɛ tìtom anɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì kìlɛɛ, ɓisuu righàɓ ɗi ɓɛ̀kèn; fɔɔnnɛ à yùghà kìkpaà Kan lɛ: Ki yeesii ɓi wɔ yɛ̀ɛ gèni wɛ̀m à càri mɛ̀ rì gìlɛ̀n cɛ̀ncɛm? Kali ɓà nyi lɛ a yu mɛ̀ kì gheŋzii.
Kan à ɓàg Maata lɛ: Maata wɔ̀, u kpuukputɛ̀n, nɗem wɔɔ wu ki cɛɛcɛɛ̀rɛ̀n ɓi ɓìɓan lɛɛ̀gwey.
Wɔ̀lɛ kìɓan kifog kɛɛ ri rì gɛɓsɛ̀n; Marii àa ɓɔ̀ni gàɓ ì syeesyee; ɓaa ɓàtɛn ɓi nyi yɔ̀.

Ŋwos adɛŋ, Yeesus à ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzìghà ɓi jàŋ idɛŋ; yɛ̀ɛ à lègsìghà bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n nni n-yilàg wìì adɛŋ, à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan, rèsàg ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ ti ɓɔ̀ŋzag, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ à rèsàkà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, lannɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔŋzag.
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔŋzàg, kaliina lɛ: Tààta! Ɗii ɗyɔɔ ɗyɛɛ ɓa ɗì tɛnɛn; kìlàmì kɔɔ kɛɛ yu.
Ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm faa ɓìsi ɓìɗilàg ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɓìsi ɓi bimiɗ a ŋwos.
Cenɛn ɓìsi ɓìɓe ɓis, lɛ ɓìsi girig tì ti tì cenàg ŋwaànɛ à kaa ɓìsi kìɓan. Kɔ̀ɔ ki càɗ ɓisi lɛ ti kpi ɓi mɛ̀fèèghrɛn ɓiɗùm.
Nni à kpaatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: I kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki ri rì rìghan, nni rìghan ɗiǹ ɗi yuù nyi kì ghɛɛ̀ rì ǹɗem-irù, ɗi kpaa nyi lɛ: Reŋkàŋ wɛ̀m, ɓɔ̀rɛn ɓà mɛ bìrɛs yiraa,
lɛ reŋkàŋ wɛ̀m àdɛŋ à rìì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀, nni à kpaŋi a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, fɔɔnnɛ ǹki yin ɗi com ki lɛ, ǹfa nyi à ɗi.
Nni i roànɛ̀n à ɓàghiì nyi wɔɔ ɓi naa lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ̀ yeesi mɛ màa mɛ sìmdɛ̀n, rì mɛ̀ rì ɓɔn ɓɛm, tì mɛ nɔ̀ŋi ɓi zi, ǹ-yiidi lɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛ̀n tì aɗyòò lɛ ǹfa wɔ̀ bìrɛs.

Ǹkalii mìni lɛ, àa soo pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi aɗyòò lɛ a fa nyi bìrɛs, ɓi ɗii ɗi lɛ reŋkàŋ wìì, à rì ɓiì pɛ̀sɛɛ aɗyòò, à fa nyi com kìcèm ki roànɛ̀n à tɔɔgh nyi lɛ a caɗ nyi lɛ fyòoog kɛ̀ɛ yeesi nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkpaatii mìni lɛ, lɔnina, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì faà; kaana, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓì ɓiì tanɛɛ, ɓooghna ìsuunaa, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ ri mìni wɔ ɓiì nɛmì;
lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à lɔni com, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ falàg nyi kɔ̀, roànɛ à kaa, à ti à tanàg, fɔɔnnɛ roànɛ à ɓoogh naa, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ nɛngì nyi yɔ̀.
Ghɛn anɛ ɓi mìni yɛɛrì lɛ, à ɓa rìkuu ɗi seŋi ɗi lɛ, i man à lɔni bìrɛs, nyii fa man ànɛ̀n gɔ̀g, nsoò lɛ i man à lɔni nyi kìzɛn, nyii fa man ànɛ̀n nyoo ɓi sìg à kìzɛŋ?
Nsoò lɛ i à lɔni nyi ɗìg, nyii fa man fìrèè fi taataɓɓɛ̀n?
I mìni ɓɛ ɓì rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum ɓi yii rìfa ɗi ɓɔn ɓin ɓɛsyeesyee ɓɛ ɓyom, lannɛ Tààta ànɛ à rì aɗyòò à ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi kɛ̀ɛ fa Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ tɔɔgh nyi kɔ̀?

Yeesus à nànàɓkà kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ki pɛɛ̀zìghà mum mùm-mùm, nni yɛ̀ɛ kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn ki kpagà, ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà mùm-mùm anɛ̀n à tòòghrɛ̀n; fɔɔnnɛ gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ ì kuuràkà kìɓan kiǹ.
Kìɓan kifog ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ɓi-tèɗ wu Bɛlzeɓul ànɛ àrì rìfòm ɗi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay innɛ a nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay.
Ɓi ɗi lɛ, ɓɛɛ feèghrɛn nyi, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ a resi ɓɔ kìrèmzɛnà kidɛŋ ki ki resii lɛ ìtèɗ wu a kìki ɓiɓan miì, wu riì aɗyòò.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yighà ɓɛ̀fèg ɓaa, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm ki ki ghasɛɛ gàɓ yiɓɛɛ̀ lɛ kɛɛ ɗuu rì kɔmiɗ, ki ri ɓiì cuù, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛɛ mɛcèm mɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kin mɛ ɓiì kpìlaagh.
Nni i Satàn a ti ǹghasɛn gàɓ yiɓɛɛ̀, lɛ a ɗuù rì nyimiɗ, lannɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ kii ki ri ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ asu; yɛ̀ɛ mìniì kalag lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ nànaɓ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ìtèɗ wu Bɛlzeɓul?
I mɛ̀ɛ nki nànaɓ min ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ìtèɗ wu Bɛlzeɓul, ɓɔn ɓin ɓɔɔ̀ nànaɓ ɓyɔ rì ìtèɗ wu ghɛn? Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɔn ɓin ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛɛ faa gɛ mìni zɔɔ ɓi kìɓan kiǹ.
Kìɓan kifog, i ki rì lɛ nnànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ìtèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll fɔlɔɔ a rèsii lɛ, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki ti a lɔ̀ŋkin.
I kìtèetèɗ ki mum ki ki ri rì ɓyom ɓi ribaŋì kɛɛ̀ ɓèŋɓeŋ mɛɛ mɛ kɔ, ŋwaà yin lɛ à kòm ɓyom ɓii.
Wɔ̀lɛ i ŋwaànɛ à cee ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓi-tèɗ à kpaŋi, à kwiy nyi, à ɓàtɛ̀n ɓyom ɓi ribaŋì ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n àa ǹɗì rì ǹtyweeyi miì, à kàɓsag ɓyom ɓii ɓìcèm ɓi à ɓàtaagh.
Mum bimiɗ ànɛ à yin ɓi gàm yɛ̀m, a ɗùùɗuu ri mɛ̀, fɔɔnnɛ roànɛ à ɓasɛɛ ɓi ri mɛ̀ ɓi rìtaŋzɛ̀n, à rì roànɛ à rì ɓi rìtyàŋzì.

Cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki kìɓeɓtàg ki nghas̀ ki kpaŋi mum ɓi nyoo, ki kɛǹ kì dèŋdeŋi ɓi kìgbag ki jàŋ ɓi rìkaakàà ɗi rifɔɔsɛ̀n; i kaa rɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn jàŋ i rìfɔɔsɛ̀n, ki kpaa lɛ: Ǹɗì ɓiì sugtii ɓi naa ìnɛ mɛ̀ɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛɛ yì miì.
I ki sugtii yì, ki tanɛ̀n lɛ mɛɛ mɛ ti lɛ, mɔ mɛ fyɔngakɛn, mɛ ki ɓa ti mɛ rɛ̀ŋɛn,

ki kɛɛ̀dì min, ki teɗtìì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghas̀ ɓidɛŋ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi ɓi cee kɔ ɓi rìnyɛn, ɓi ɗiŋì ɓi naànɛ̀n ɓi kɔrì miì. Fɔɔnnɛ siitòn a rìɓa à ŋwaànɛ̀n à rì ɓiì ɓeɓtɛɛ à cee rìɓa ɗi à ɓaghà ǹtonto.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni giɓ à toòghrɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Mààgh rì giɓ anɛ à tɛ̀tɛ̀kà wɔ̀ ɓi ɗùm ɗii, à ki nyɔŋzi wɔ mɛlì mii.
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki lɛ, ɓɛ wowòg jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ki ɓèŋɓeŋ yɔ̀, ɓɛɛ ri kom̀ ɗì ɓɛ̀mààgh.

Yɛ̀ɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki taŋzɛ̀ngà Yeesus a nyoo, nni à tumɛ̀ngà rìkpaa lɛ: Gbàà ì ɓum ì gɛɛ̀nɛ ìnɛ ì ɓeɓtɛɛ mɛ̀rem ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ tɔtɔg mɛ lɛ ǹɗesi yɔ̀ dàm ì kìɓan, nni ɓaa ghɛn ɓi dàm ì kìɓan idɛŋ, i ki cee ɓi lɛ dàm ì kìɓan ki ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan anɛ lɛ Zyonas.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Zyonas à ɓaghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìrèmzɛnà ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ a Niniivɛ fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Man à mum à ɓiì ɓaa ɓisuu gbàà ì gɛɛ̀nɛ.

Ŋwosi rìren ɗi ɓiɓan, giɓ anɛ à làlàmìghà kìden ki zi ki duŋzi à pɛ̀sɛɛ gɛ aɗyòò, à fa gbàà ì ɓum ì gɛɛ̀nɛ bɛ̀lɛn, ɓisuulɛ nyii pɛsɛ̀ngày ɓi jaŋ̀ inɛ zi i sugtɛɛ, lɛ a yu kì woògh ɓìtòkì ɓi ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓi Salomɔŋ à tòtòkà. Nni ghɛɛna lɛ, mìnii rì fɛ ri ŋwaànɛ à ceetii Salomɔŋ.

Ɓumɓɛ a Niniivɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛɛ gɛ aɗyòò ŋwosi riren ɗi ɓiɓan, ɓɛ fa gbàà ì gɛɛ̀nɛ bɛ̀lɛn ɓisuulɛ, ɓɔɔ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà mɛ̀rem yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi Zyonas à kpaaghà ɓɔ, nni ghɛɛna lɛ, ɓì rì fɛ rì ŋwaànɛ à ceetii Zyonas.
Ŋwaà yin lɛ à ròòsì lamɓà lɛ a nyam nyi, nsoò lɛ a foŋ nyi a kìbɔkɔ̀ zi, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ fogi lamɓà ɓi kìrɛsì kii aɗyòò ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɗiɗiŋii ɓi naa, ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ kìtɛɛtɛn.
Ɗis ɗyɔɔ ɗi ri lamɓà à nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀; i ɗis ɗyɔɔ ɗi ri lɛ syeesyee nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀ bimiɗ ì ɓiì ɓaà ɓi kìtɛɛtɛ̀n. Kìɓan kifog, cààmɛ̀n ki ɗis ɗyɔɔ ɗi yin lɛ syeesyee, nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀ i ɓa ɓi birìm.
Nni kɔ̀ri min ɗyomzɛ̀n lɛ, kìtɛɛtɛn ki ù rì rì kɔ, kɛ̀ kɛɛ ghay birìm.
I nyoo bimiɗ ì rì ǹkpeŋziyɛn nsoò maa kìkàɓ àdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ɓi birìm, nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀ bimiɗ ì ɓiì ɓaà lɛ kpeŋkpèèŋ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ lamɓà à ti à kpeŋzàg wɔ̀ rì kìtɛɛtɛn kii.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à tòtòkà, nni Fàrìzyɛŋ àdɛŋ à tɔkà nyi lɛ, a yu kì ɗiì a mɛɛ mii. Fɔɔnnɛ a ɗìŋìyà wɔɔ, ɓɛ kɔrì ɓi ɓìɗilàg.
Fàrìzyɛŋ ànɛ̀n à kuuràg lɛ, Yeesus à tumɛɛ rìɗi ɗi ɓyom kɛ̀ɛ sòò ɓyàg.
Wɔ̀lɛ, Kan à kpaa nyi lɛ: Mìni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ, ɓi ti ɓì tɔ̀sàg lɛ, rì jɛ̀m ì ɓeŋ, rì jɛ̀m ì taasà, kìɓan kifog mɛ̀rem min mɛ ron lɛ rì wii rì rìgɛn.
Mìni ɓìdùŋdùŋ ɓi ɓum ɓì, àa roànɛ à kìghà dan nnyɛɛ kìtìghà ɗùm?
Com ki ɓyàa ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi ki ri lɛ, ɓi fa ɓɛ̀soghàsogha ɓyom rì nɗem wu syeesyee, fɔɔnnɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓiì ɓaà ɓìtɛnɛn ɓisu wìn.

Nni nyìighnyìg rì mìni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ lɛ, mìnii ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll rì gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ìnɛ ɓi mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓinyàa mɛ̀cèm, ɓì sɛɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀tì lɛ, rì saaɗ ɗì rìkeesì ri Bɛ̀ll, kɔlɛ com ki ɓyàa ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii kɛɛ̀ kìn lɔɔ, kɛ̀ ɓi ki pisi mis ɗì ɓìɓan ɓimbog.
